專為 MAC 設計

Things 專為 Mac 量身訂製並有深度系統整合。快速從其他應用程式建立待辦事項、連接您的行事曆、添加各式小工具、從提醒事項匯入—Things 無所不能！甚至有內建捷徑讓您自動化工作流。


獲獎設計

Things 因其出色的設計而獲得許多讚譽，包括兩次獲得蘋果設計獎。每個細節都經過深思熟慮，並力求完善。

「簡直是生產力工具界的獨角獸：足夠深入以完成嚴肅的工作，又不可思議地易於使用，精美的設計令人光是看著也著迷。」
—Apple


現在就用 THINGS

無論您想在生活中完成什麼，Things 都能幫助您達到目標。現在就安裝應用程式，看看您能做些什麼！

• Things 亦推出 iPad、iPhone、Apple Watch 與 Apple Vision Pro 版（分開銷售）。
• 透過 Things Cloud 服務免費同步。
• 提供 Mac 免費試用版：www.things.app

若有任何問題，敬請與我們聯繫。我們將很樂意提供協助。

tw.releaseNotes:
- New: You can now read and clear the error memory of the engine control unit through CarPlay.
- Fixed: Connection issue with unresponsive control units.
tw.description:
BimmerLink is the direct link to your BMW or MINI. Using one of the supported OBD adapters, you can read trouble codes or display sensor values in realtime, check the current state of the DPF in your car or register a new battery after replacement. BimmerLink even allows you to remotely control the exhaust flap or mute the Active Sound Design in your car.

READ AND CLEAR TROUBLE CODES
Diagnose your car as would otherwise be possible only by your Service Partner. In contrast to generic OBD apps that read emission related errors only, BimmerLink allows you to read and clear trouble codes from ALL control units in your car.

DISPLAY REALTIME SENSOR VALUES
BimmerLink provides a big selection of values like oil temperature or boost pressure. Keep an eye on all the important parameters of your car with a personalized dashboard.

EXHAUST FLAP REMOTE CONTROL*
Take control over the exhaust flap in your car and decide yourself, whether it should be closed or open.

ACTIVE SOUND DESIGN**
If you do not like the artificial engine sound generated in your car, just mute the Active Sound Design with BimmerLink.

SOUND TUNING***
The “Sound Tuning” option allows you to disable the “exhaust burble“ in cars equipped with the S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4).

DPF REGENERATION****
BimmerLink allows you to check the current state of the diesel particulate filter in your car. Find out when the last regeneration took place or how much ash has accumulated in the filter and start a regeneration with the touch of a button.

CARPLAY ADD-ON*****
Enhance your driving experience with the CarPlay add-on for BimmerLink. Access your sensor values on your car's display for improved vehicle monitoring, all integrated seamlessly with CarPlay for ease of use.

BATTERY REGISTRATION
If you want to replace the battery in your car, this has to be registered in the engine control unit and BimmerLink allows you to do this yourself now.

PARKING BRAKE SERVICE MODE
BimmerLink allows you to activate the service mode for the electromechanical parking brake.

SERVICE RESET
Reset the service display in your car after carrying out maintenance work like a brake pad replacement or an engine oil change.

RESET SHORT CIRCUIT LOCKS
Unlock lamp outputs that were disabled due to a short circuit.

TRANSMISSION ADAPTATION VALUES
Check the adaptation values of the ZF 8HP automatic transmission in your vehicle.

REQUIRED ACCESSORIES
To use the app, one of the supported Bluetooth or WiFi OBD adapters or cables is required. For more information please visit https://bimmerlink.app.

SUPPORTED CARS
- 1 Series (2004+)
- 2 Series, M2 (2013+)
- 2 Series Active Tourer (2014+)
- 2 Series Gran Tourer (2015+)
- 3 Series, M3 (2005+)
- 4 Series, M4 (2013+)
- 5 Series, M5 (2003+)
- 6 Series, M6 (2003+)
- 7 Series (2008+)
- 8 Series (2018+)
- X1 (2009+)
- X2 (2018+)
- X3, X3 M (2010+)
- X4, X4 M (2014+)
- X5, X5 M (2006+)
- X6, X6 M (2008+)
- X7 (2019+)
- Z4 (2009+)
- i3 (2013+)
- i4 (2021+)
- i7 (2022+)
- i8 (2013+)
- iX (2021+)
- iX1 (2022+)
- iX3 (2021+)
- MINI (2006+)
- Toyota Supra (2019+)

* Only for cars that are equipped with an exhaust flap by factory.
** Only for cars that are equipped with the “Active Sound Design“ by factory.
*** Only for cars with S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4).
**** Only for cars with a diesel engine.
***** Additional in-app purchase required.

tw.releaseNotes:
- Slight changes to the graphical interface.
- Fixed bugs that caused issues on some devices.
tw.description:
Dive into the world of the energy industry with the Power Grid app, designed by award-winning author Friedemann Friese.

Global Domination: Conquer energy markets worldwide on maps such as USA, Germany, France, Benelux, Eastern Europe, South Africa, Italy and the Middle East. Each map brings unique gameplay that will put your strategic skills to the test.

Tutorial & Help: Whether you're an experienced Power Grid player or a beginner, the game features a detailed tutorial that walks you through the basics step-by-step. And if you have any questions while playing, context-sensitive help is available to make sure you're always on the right track.

Achievements:  Challenge yourself by unlocking a variety of achievements. These achievements range from strategic feats to special challenges.

Recharged Version: The app includes the Recharged version with Against the Trust and MAGA variants that make the gameplay even more diverse and challenging.

Exciting Gameplay: Challenge AI opponents or play against friends in real-time or turn-based.

Online Domination: The Power Grid app allows you to compete against friends or rivals from around the world. The app gives you the opportunity to compete with players from all over the world.

Choose your path: a variety of maps and map variants are available to customize and refine your strategy. Adapt to the specifics of each and outsmart your opponents to get to the top of the power industry.

The Power Grid app has been carefully designed to seamlessly bring the charm of the board game to your smartphone or tablet. The intuitive interface ensures a smooth gaming experience for both experienced players and novices.

Don't miss out on the electrifying fun and challenges offered by the Power Grid app! Download the app now and embark on a journey to conquer the power market one move at a time. Whether you're playing alone and looking for a challenge or you're a player looking to engage in epic duels with friends, the Power Grid app offers all that and more.

《漢末霸業》IOS版2.3.3補丁更新公告（V1.0.6.4050）
本次更新的主要內容如下：（8月21日 10:00）
1.修復進入副本閃退的問題。
tw.description:
《漢末霸業》要求系統版本為iOS 16以上，並使用iPhone 8或8 Plus、iPhone X及以上、iPad Air 2、iPad mini 4、iPad 2017或任意iPad Pro進行遊戲。

官方微博：
http://weibo.com/longyougame
遊俠網合作論壇：
http://game.ali213.net/forum-1723-1.html
QQ群: 293787531   795489685
Facebook: 搜索 三國誌漢末霸業

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

tw.releaseNotes: This is a tiny update that we've improved the app stability to help us serve you better.
tw.sellerName: Hangzhou Beesoft Information Technology Co., Ltd.
tw.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

tw.releaseNotes:
• 改善穩定性與問題修復。


THINGS 3.22

Things 已經準備好與 macOS 26 Tahoe 接軌！將帶來全新的應用程式圖示、全面煥新的介面、控制按鈕、新圖示和小工具樣式支援以及更多全新變化。

全新的外觀與感受

• Things 的介面在所有角落全面煥新。您將會注意到側邊欄現在加上了一絲玻璃質感，能讓色彩隱約透現；視窗、對話與待辦事項的邊角更加圓潤。
• Things 的圖示經過修飾與調整，以完美融入 macOS 26 環境。不過還是令人一眼就能認出是 Things。
• 圖示和小工具樣式：Things 的應用程式圖示和小工具現在也支援 Mac 上的樣式變換。若要變更樣式，請前往系統設定 > 外觀，並選擇深色、淺色或通透。

快速控制

Things 方便的控制按鈕現在也能在 Mac 上使用。請從選單列開啟控制中心，並點擊「編輯控制項目」。Things 提供新待辦事項與清單（您可以自行選擇清單）的控制。您可以將其置於控制中心中，或者直接放到選單列中以一鍵存取。

以及更多

• 現在可以透過 Spotlight 建立待辦事項。叫出 Spotlight（⌘ 空白鍵）後，輸入「建立待辦事項」，按下 Return 鍵，然後輸入標題。您的新待辦事項便已建立在收件箱中——無論 Things 是否運轉中。
• Things 的快速輸入功能現在也支援從最新的 Comet 瀏覽器新增連結。

我們希望您能在 macOS 26 Tahoe 上暢快享用 Things！
tw.description:
把事情做好！獲獎肯定的 Things 應用程式幫助您規劃一天行程、管理專案，並幫助您按部就班地朝目標邁進。

除了強大的功能外，最厲害的是，使用起來非常簡單方便。在短時間內理清瑣事，無論是基本任務還是偉大的人生目標都頓時變得井然有序，然後開始專注在今天最重要的事情上。

「在所有我們測試過的應用程式中，Things 在設計與功能結合方面表現最優，除了幾乎具備所有其他用戶應用程式的強大功能外，還有著永遠不會干擾您工作的愉悅介面。」
—Wirecutter, 紐約時報


主要功能

• 您的待辦事項
以強大的「待辦事項」為基本組成部分 — 每一則待辦事項都是邁向大成就的一小步。您可以為其添加備註、加上標籤、安排時程，或者再將其細分成更小的步驟。

• 您的專案
為任何重大目標建立專案，再添加待辦事項以完成目標。在進行規劃時，使用標目讓清單更井井有條。還有一個地方可以寫下備註，並可以訂定完成時限以掌控進度。

• 您的領域
將人生的各個不同部分設為「領域」，例如工作、家庭、理財等等。這讓一切井井有條，並讓您在處理細節時仍能看清全局。

• 您的計劃
您的日程安排的所有內容都整齊地排列在「今天」和「即將到來」清單中，顯示待辦事項和行事曆事件。每天早上，查看今天計劃並決定想做什麼。


更多您會喜愛的內容

進一步熟悉後，您會發現 Things 還有許多其他有用的功能。僅在此舉些例子：

• 提醒事項 — 設定時間後 Things 便會自動提醒您。
• 重複 — 自動依據您設定的時間表重複待辦事項。
• 今晚 — 特別讓您安排今晚計劃。
• 行事曆整合 — 同時查看事件與待辦事項。
• 標籤 — 將待辦事項分類並快速篩選清單。
• 快速輸入— 只要一想到一件事便可以隨時從任何地方建立待辦事項。
• 快速查找 — 立即找到待辦事項、標目或標籤。
• 輸入任意門 — 利用鍵盤從一個清單跳到另一個清單，只需開始鍵入！
• 小工具 — 在桌面上或「通知中心」中看見您的清單。
• 郵寄至 Things — 將電子郵件轉發到 Things，變成待辦事項。
• Markdown — 為筆記加上層級與樣式。


專為 MAC 設計

Things 專為 Mac 量身訂製並有深度系統整合。快速從其他應用程式建立待辦事項、連接您的行事曆、添加各式小工具、從提醒事項匯入—Things 無所不能！甚至有內建捷徑讓您自動化工作流。


獲獎設計

Things 因其出色的設計而獲得許多讚譽，包括兩次獲得蘋果設計獎。每個細節都經過深思熟慮，並力求完善。

「簡直是生產力工具界的獨角獸：足夠深入以完成嚴肅的工作，又不可思議地易於使用，精美的設計令人光是看著也著迷。」
—Apple


現在就用 THINGS

無論您想在生活中完成什麼，Things 都能幫助您達到目標。現在就安裝應用程式，看看您能做些什麼！

• Things 亦推出 iPad、iPhone、Apple Watch 與 Apple Vision Pro 版（分開銷售）。
• 透過 Things Cloud 服務免費同步。
• 提供 Mac 免費試用版：www.things.app

若有任何問題，敬請與我們聯繫。我們將很樂意提供協助。

tw.releaseNotes:
• 改善穩定性與問題修復。


THINGS 3.22

Things 已經準備好與 iOS 和 watchOS 26 接軌！將帶來新的應用程式圖示、全面煥新的介面、更多的圖示和小工具樣式，以及在 Apple Watch 上的控制按鈕。

全新的外觀與感受

• Things 的介面在所有角落全面煥新。無論是視窗、對話還是待辦事項，您都會發現邊角更加圓潤；按鈕則加上了可以呈現光線折射並映現周圍內容的玻璃質感。
• Things 的圖示經過修飾與調整，以完美融入 iOS 26 環境。不過還是令人一眼就能認出是 Things。
• 圖示與小工具樣式：除了深色與淺色樣式外，iOS 26 還增添了通透樣式——一種能讓您的桌布透顯出來的玻璃質感樣式。若要在 iPhone 上修改樣式，只要長按主畫面，接著輕點編輯 > 自訂即可。

APPLE WATCH 上的控制按鈕

Things 方便的新待辦事項控制，現在也能在 Apple Watch 上使用。只需按下側邊按鈕，叫出控制中心並點按編輯。這個控制按鈕讓您可以透過滑動、輸入或語音快速建立新待辦事項。

我們希望您能在 iOS 26 與 watchOS 26 上暢快享用 Things！

• 快速查找 — 立即找到待辦事項或在清單間切換。
• 神奇加號 — 拖動「+」按鍵以將待辦事項插入清單任何位置。
• 郵寄至 Things — 將電子郵件轉發到 Things，變成待辦事項。
• Markdown — 為筆記加上層級與樣式。
• Apple Watch 應用程式 — 提起手腕立即查看今天清單。


為 IPHONE 設計

Things 專為 iPhone 量身規劃並有深度系統整合。快速從其他應用程式建立待辦事項、連接您的行事曆、添加各式小工具、跟 Siri 對話，並以捷徑整合 —Things 無所不能！


獲獎設計

Things 因其出色的設計而獲得許多讚譽，包括兩次獲得蘋果設計獎。每個細節都經過深思熟慮，並力求完善。

「簡直是生產力工具界的獨角獸：足夠深入以完成嚴肅的工作，又不可思議地易於使用，精美的設計令人光是看著也著迷。」
—Apple


現在就用 THINGS

無論您想在生活中完成什麼，Things 都能幫助您達到目標。現在就安裝應用程式，看看您能做些什麼！

• Things 亦推出 Mac、iPad 與 Apple Vision Pro 版（分開銷售）。
• 透過 Things Cloud 服務免費同步。
• 提供 Mac 免費試用版：www.things.app

若有任何問題，敬請與我們聯繫。我們將很樂意提供協助。

tw.trackName: Be Focused Pro – 專工作學習番茄計時器
tw.description:
專注於任務對於我們這個綁定於螢幕的世代來說是一項真正的挑戰。Be Focused 透過將單個任務分解為不同的時間間隔，並由短暫的休息時間分隔，協助您完成工作。這是一種令人驚訝的有效方法，可保持動力和專注。建立任務、配置休息時間，並在一天、一週或自訂期間內追蹤您的進度。您可以在 iPhone、iPad 或 Mac 上使用 Be Focused — 所有內容都能完美同步。

任務管理

•	建立和管理任務
•	為任務添加備註和截止日期
•	使用標籤和篩選器組織任務
•	從其他應用程式貼上任務清單

計時器控制

•	開始、暫停或跳過間隔
•	自動開始下一個間隔（可選）
•	規劃完成任務所需的間隔並追蹤準確性
•	管理已完成的間隔

計時器自訂

•	設定工作時段、短暫休息和長時間休息的持續時間
•	定義長時間休息前的間隔數量
•	設定每日完成間隔的目標
•	為各個任務分配不同的計時器設定

報告

•	查看詳細報告以監控您的進度
•	將資料匯出為 CSV 格式

聲音與通知

•	可調整頻率的碼錶滴答聲
•	多種鬧鐘聲音
•	互動式通知
•	可調整的鬧鐘和碼錶音量

整合

•	在所有裝置間同步（iPhone、iPad、Mac）*
•	與 Focus Matrix 整合，使用緊急/重要原則管理任務 **
•	與「快捷指令」App 整合，以自動化工作流程

快速存取

•	鎖定畫面和主畫面的小工具
•	鎖定畫面和動態島的即時動態
•	可從鎖定畫面、控制中心或動作按鈕啟動或停止計時器

自動化

•	與「快捷指令」App 整合（透過「快捷指令」App 控制任務和計時器）
•	在 Be Focused App 中基於事件自動執行「快捷指令」

裝置支援

•	支援 Apple Watch
•	也適用於 Mac
•	支援深色和淺色模式

* 與 Mac 同步需要另外購買 Be Focused Pro for macOS。
** 與 Focus Matrix 的整合需要購買 Focus Matrix 的專業版。

tw.description:
MiniGames 是一個包含新、復古和現代遊戲的合集。您可以在您的 Apple Watch、iPhone 或 iPad 上無廣告遊玩！
這就像是您隨身攜帶的個人遊戲機台。

這個合集包含 24 款遊戲：

■ PONG
遊玩其中一個最早創建的電子遊戲。這個簡單的網球類遊戲是一個絕對的經典。

■ BRICK BREAK
一個有趣的復古落磚遊戲。使用數位旋鈕或您的手指來移動磚塊。點擊以旋轉，向下滑動以放置磚塊。將磚塊堆疊在一起以清除一行並獲取一些分數。

■ INVADERS
經典街機動作。射擊所有太空入侵者，在他們抓到你之前。擊中母艦以獲取獎勵分數。

■ 2048
在您的手錶或手機上享受令人上癮的 2048 遊戲。滑動數字瓷磚來合併它們。將瓷磚合併以達到 2048。

■ TUBE TWIST
引導您的跑者穿過無盡的管道。扭轉管道以避開洞穴和尖刺。收集黃色能量球，收集的越多，速度提升的時間越長。點擊您的玩家來啟動加速。加速時撞擊紅色跳躍點可獲取額外分數。

■ BUBBLE
經典的三消益智遊戲。按顏色連接泡泡以清除它們。

■ MISSILE
您能在致命的追蹤導彈攻擊下生存多久？操縱您的戰鬥機以避開導彈並讓它們互相碰撞。

■ HOP
從平台跳到平台以獲得更多的高度和分數。在途中射擊帶翅膀的壞蛋。

■ DRIFT
享受在險惡道路上的高辛烷值漂移。一個錯誤的動作就會墜落。儘可能長時間生存以獲得最高分數。收集星星以獲取額外分數。

■ CONG
這像 Pong，但在一個圓圈裡。使用數位旋鈕來移動圓圈內的拍子，保持球在遊戲中。

■ TOWER
通過堆疊彩色方塊來建造您的塔。完美放置它們以獲取額外分數。

■ FLAP
引導鳥兒穿越無盡的森林，不斷拍動翅膀。

■ FROG ROAD
幫助可愛的青蛙避開汽車並穿過馬路。這是經典 Frogger 遊戲的 3D 升級版。

■ BLOCK RUN
想跑步嗎？幫助體素小人避開五彩繽紛的障礙物，通過跳躍、滾動和轉彎來完成挑戰。

■ MATCHTRIS
Tetris 和 Dr. Mario 的混搭遊戲。移動下落的方塊來連接 4 個或更多相同顏色的方塊以清除它們。設置方塊以實現連鎖反應並獲取額外分數。

■ DRONE
駕駛您的無人機穿過外星飛船的無盡走廊。

■ THRUST
穿上火箭靴並飛越黑暗的洞穴。Thrust 結合了經典洞穴飛行遊戲和 Flappy Bird 的元素。

■ SUPER JUMP
我們將平台遊戲的樂趣與無盡奔跑者遊戲相結合。通過跳過洞穴、壕溝和敵人來保持您的玩家奔跑。收集水果以獲取分數，您得分越多，跑得越快。

■ RETRO RACER
受 Outrun 和 Pole Position 等偽 3D 賽車遊戲啟發，但具有現代圖形。享受超現實、令人興奮的速度感，並競速以擊敗時鐘。

請注意，此遊戲需要第 4 代或更新版本的 Apple Watch。

■ CONTRA PANG
將 Contra 的射擊動作與 Pang 的泡泡消除樂趣相結合的遊戲。

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
經典 Space Invaders 的新變種。具有獨特的圓形設計和大量的能量提升。

■ MOON SNAKE
我們將經典的吃水果蛇遊戲帶到了月球。避開炸彈和自己的尾巴以生存。

■ DUAL BREAK
還有什麼比經典的 Breakout 拍子遊戲更好？怎麼樣再加上能量提升和額外的拍子來控制。

■ CIRCLE BREAK
這就像圓形 Pong 遇上 Breakout。保持球不離開圓圈並打破所有障礙以完成關卡。

功能：
• 無廣告！
• 支援 Apple Watch
• 屏幕震動
• 震動效果
• 音效
• 音樂
• 排行榜

us.description:
Slash your way through the hordes of darkness and defeat King Valor's fearsome guardians in this breathtaking adventure!

"Chaining together a slick series of attacks, dodges, and jumps, is incredibly satisfying." — PocketGamer

"I suspect mobile gaming fans will be playing and replaying this one for years to come." — TouchArcade, 5/5

A malicious power stirs in the forgotten kingdom of Vallaris. Tasked with discovering the fate of its lost king, your quest quickly takes a sinister turn and you are cast into darkness. Surrounded and outnumbered, you must grab your sword, steel your temper and fight your way through a land that does not welcome you. Except for the friendly merchant - he's grateful for your business.

ABOUT THE GAME
Grimvalor is a challenging hack & slash platformer with fast-paced combat in a dark fantasy world. Take control of a lone warrior on a quest to restore a corrupted realm. Embark on a journey through atmospheric landscapes and dungeons in a massive story-driven premium experience.

COMBAT & EXPLORATION
Master skill-based combat, learn enemy patterns and bring them down with all your fury. Explore the shattered lands of Vallaris, find and upgrade equipment and level up your character. Face the legacy of King Valor's madness and prevail!

FEATURES
• Epic boss fights
• Stunning 3D visuals accelerated by Metal graphics
• Accurate and customizable touch controls
• Full support for MFi game controllers
• Use iCloud to keep your saves in sync between devices.
• Play offline - perfect for commute.
• No ads or in-app purchases

us.description:
RCS: Real Combat Simulator – Rule the Skies!
The Ultimate Military Flight Combat Experience on Mobile

Take control in the most advanced military flight simulator: pilot legendary fighter jets, engage in epic dogfights, master air-to-air and air-to-ground combat, and prove your skill as an elite combat pilot.

Fly and Fight Anywhere in the World!

-Master takeoffs, landings, and full combat missions
-Pilot state-of-the-art jets with realistic avionics and detailed cockpits
-Access thousands of global airports and military airbases
-Train with interactive tutorials and sharpen your combat skills

Realistic Fighter Jets:
Fly faithfully recreated aircraft with dynamic cockpits, authentic flight physics, and full weapons systems
-A-10C Thunderbolt II – The armored close-air-support powerhouse, featuring the GAU-8 Avenger cannon and precision strike capability.
-F/A-18 Super Hornet – A versatile carrier-based multirole jet with advanced avionics and a wide weapons loadout, perfect for dogfighting and precision strikes.
-M-346FA Master – A modern, agile fighter-trainer equipped with digital displays and advanced sensors.
-F-16C Fighting Falcon – The iconic multirole fighter, prized for its speed, agility, and versatility. Equipped with advanced radar, fly-by-wire controls, and a wide array of precision air-to-air and air-to-ground weapons.
More aircraft coming soon!

Immersive Combat Features:
-Global battle zones with real-world weather and time-of-day effects
-Advanced radar and targeting systems for air and ground threats
-Full arsenal of missiles, bombs, cannons, and countermeasures
-High-speed maneuvers and satellite-based terrain

Mission Editor & Multiplayer:
-Create custom missions: set objectives, control weather, and define enemy AI
-Build your own lobbies, design scenarios, and fly missions together in real-time multiplayer
-Choose Your Battlefield – Select from realistic global locations and military airbases.
-Share your creations and relive your best battles with advanced replay tools

Personalize Your Experience:
-Customize your jet with authentic liveries and camo patterns
-Capture cinematic dogfights with advanced in-game cameras
-Share your combat highlights with the RCS community

An internet connection is required for full simulation and multiplayer features. Some features may require a subscription.

Download now the ultimate military flight simulator! Fly modern fighter jets, join intense air combat missions, and dominate the skies in RCS: Real Combat Simulator.

us.description:
The ultimate system monitor, seamlessly integrated into your menubar.

iStat Menus covers a huge range of stats, including CPU, GPU, memory, network usage, disk usage, time, battery, weather and more. iStat Menus 7 is a full reboot, sporting an all-new design with hundreds of big and small improvements. iStat Menus is unmatched in efficiency, and is the most CPU-friendly system monitoring app.

• CPU and GPU •

Highly detailed CPU info, with current usage for individual cores, history graphs, load averages, uptime, CPU frequency, and a list of the apps using the most CPU. Efficiency and performance cores can be styled differently. Plus, GPU processor, memory, temperature, and frequency on supported Macs.

• Weather • Requires a paid weather subscription •

Quickly glance at current conditions in your menu bar, or dive into an incredibly detailed hourly forecast and weekly weather overview, covering low and high temperature, wind speed and direction, chance of rain, humidity, dew point, UV index, pressure, visibility and more.

• Memory •

Extensive memory stats covering usage, history, memory pressure, compressed memory, swap, and a list of the apps using the most memory.

• Rules •

iStat Menus can notify you of an incredibly wide range of events, based on CPU, GPU, memory, disks, network, sensors, battery, power and weather. This lets you be notified when your public IP has changed, if your internet connection is down, if CPU usage is above 60% for more than 10 seconds, if disk space is low, or a near-infinite range of other options.

• Disk usage and activity •

See used space, free space, and disk activity in your menu bar. S.M.A.R.T. status monitoring, per app disk usage, and more detail for all your disks is only a click away.

• Network •

Keep on top of what’s being sent and received for all network connections with history graphs, current bandwidth usage, and a bandwidth breakdown for the top apps, as well as detailed connection info, bandwidth graphs, public and private IP addresses, and an internet connectivity indicator.

• Battery and power •

Detailed info on your battery’s current state and a highly configurable menu item that can change if you’re draining, charging, or completely charged. Plus, battery levels for Bluetooth devices.

• Sensors •

A realtime listing of the sensors in your Mac, including temperatures, hard drive temperatures (where supported), fans, CPU frequency, GPU frequency (where supported), voltages, current and power. Fan speeds can be controlled, and even switched or gradually ramped based on temperatures and battery state.

• Date and time •

Highly customisable menu bar clocks, a calendar with upcoming events, and world clocks with detailed sun and moon info. Each world clock can have a custom name, to make it easier to see the time for coworkers or family members.

• Combined •

Combined mode combines multiple iStat Menus items into a single menu bar item. You can choose what’s shown in the menu bar and what’s shown in the menu, allowing you to save space in the menu bar while still having access to all the information. It’s super handy on laptops.

Privacy policy:
https://bjango.com/privacy/

Terms of use:
https://bjango.com/help/istatmenus7/licenseagreement/

us.releaseNotes: Better recording stability across various scenarios.
us.description:
Whisper Notes - Offline Speech to Text

Record voice or import audio/video files, get accurate transcripts—100% offline, on-device.
No recording limits, no subscriptions, no cloud uploads. Just $4.99, once.

■ Core Features
- 100% offline transcription—your audio never leaves your device
- Record voice memos, meetings, lectures—unlimited length
- Import audio/video files (MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV)—transcribe offline
- Extract subtitles from videos in your Camera Roll—no upload needed
- 100+ languages supported, auto-detected
- Export with timestamps (SRT, VTT, TXT)
- Batch process multiple files

■ Privacy & Speed
Your recordings stay on your iPhone/Mac, always. No internet needed, no cloud uploads, ever.

Transcription speed: On iPhone 15, 5 minutes of audio takes about 1 minute. Older devices are slower but work fine.

■ Pricing
$4.99 one-time. Most similar apps charge $100+/year in subscriptions.
No recurring fees, no in-app purchases, no ads. Pay once, use forever.
Not satisfied? Tap Settings → Request Refund.

■ Common Questions

Does it work completely offline?
Yes. Your audio never leaves your device. Works on flights, in remote areas, anywhere.

Is there a recording time limit?
No limit. Record for hours if you want. Longer recordings just take more time to transcribe on your device.

Does it support real-time transcription while recording?
Not during recording, but yes during transcription—after you finish recording, you'll see the transcript appear in real-time as it's being generated.

Where is my data stored?
Only on your device. We have zero access. Note: If you delete the app, your recordings are deleted too (because we don't keep secret backups). Please export important files regularly.

Why no AI summaries?
Privacy. We never upload your recordings to any AI service. Want summaries? Copy the transcript and use your preferred AI tool. We don't lock your data into a proprietary AI system.

Why does transcription stop when I switch apps?
iOS limits background GPU usage for third-party apps. Just return to the app and tap "Re-transcribe"—it will restart.

Can I import existing audio/video files?
Yes. Import MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV files and transcribe them offline. Great for extracting subtitles from videos without uploading to cloud services.

What languages are supported?
100+ languages including: English, Deutsch, Español, Русский, 한국어, Français, 日本語, Português, Türkçe, Polski, Català, Nederlands, Arabic, Svenska, Italiano, Bahasa Indonesia, Hindi, Suomi, Tiếng Việt, Hebrew, Українська, Greek, Bahasa Melayu, Čeština, Română, Dansk, Magyar, Tamil, Norsk, Thai, Urdu, Hrvatski, Bulgarian, Lietuvių, Latina, Māori, Malayalam, Cymraeg, Slovenčina, Telugu, Persian, Latviešu, Bengali, Српски, Azərbaycan, Slovenščina, Kannada, Eesti, Macedonian, Brezhoneg, Euskara, Íslenska, Armenian, Nepali, Mongolian, Bosanski, Kazakh, Shqip, Kiswahili, Galego, Marathi, Punjabi, Sinhala, Khmer, chiShona, Yorùbá, Soomaali, Afrikaans, Occitan, Georgian, Belarusian, Tajik, Sindhi, Gujarati, Amharic, Yiddish, Lao, Uzbek, Føroyskt, Kreyòl Ayisyen, Pashto, Turkmen, Nynorsk, Malti, Sanskrit, Luxembourgish, Myanmar, Tibetan, Tagalog, Malagasy, Assamese, Tatar, Hawaiian, Lingala, Hausa, Bashkir, Javanese, Sundanese, 简体中文, 繁體中文

■ Contact
Questions? Email support@whispernotes.app
Learn more: whispernotes.app

us.description:
BimmerLink is the direct link to your BMW or MINI. Using one of the supported OBD adapters, you can read trouble codes or display sensor values in realtime, check the current state of the DPF in your car or register a new battery after replacement. BimmerLink even allows you to remotely control the exhaust flap or mute the Active Sound Design in your car.

READ AND CLEAR TROUBLE CODES
Diagnose your car as would otherwise be possible only by your Service Partner. In contrast to generic OBD apps that read emission related errors only, BimmerLink allows you to read and clear trouble codes from ALL control units in your car.

DISPLAY REALTIME SENSOR VALUES
BimmerLink provides a big selection of values like oil temperature or boost pressure. Keep an eye on all the important parameters of your car with a personalized dashboard.

EXHAUST FLAP REMOTE CONTROL*
Take control over the exhaust flap in your car and decide yourself, whether it should be closed or open.

ACTIVE SOUND DESIGN**
If you do not like the artificial engine sound generated in your car, just mute the Active Sound Design with BimmerLink.

SOUND TUNING***
The “Sound Tuning” option allows you to disable the “exhaust burble“ in cars equipped with the S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4).

DPF REGENERATION****
BimmerLink allows you to check the current state of the diesel particulate filter in your car. Find out when the last regeneration took place or how much ash has accumulated in the filter and start a regeneration with the touch of a button.

CARPLAY ADD-ON*****
Enhance your driving experience with the CarPlay add-on for BimmerLink. Access your sensor values on your car's display for improved vehicle monitoring, all integrated seamlessly with CarPlay for ease of use.

BATTERY REGISTRATION
If you want to replace the battery in your car, this has to be registered in the engine control unit and BimmerLink allows you to do this yourself now.

PARKING BRAKE SERVICE MODE
BimmerLink allows you to activate the service mode for the electromechanical parking brake.

SERVICE RESET
Reset the service display in your car after carrying out maintenance work like a brake pad replacement or an engine oil change.

RESET SHORT CIRCUIT LOCKS
Unlock lamp outputs that were disabled due to a short circuit.

TRANSMISSION ADAPTATION VALUES
Check the adaptation values of the ZF 8HP automatic transmission in your vehicle.

REQUIRED ACCESSORIES
To use the app, one of the supported Bluetooth or WiFi OBD adapters or cables is required. For more information please visit https://bimmerlink.app.

SUPPORTED CARS
- 1 Series (2004+)
- 2 Series, M2 (2013+)
- 2 Series Active Tourer (2014+)
- 2 Series Gran Tourer (2015+)

us.description:
Dive into the world of the energy industry with the Power Grid app, designed by award-winning author Friedemann Friese.

Global Domination: Conquer energy markets worldwide on maps such as USA, Germany, France, Benelux, Eastern Europe, South Africa, Italy and the Middle East. Each map brings unique gameplay that will put your strategic skills to the test.

Tutorial & Help: Whether you're an experienced Power Grid player or a beginner, the game features a detailed tutorial that walks you through the basics step-by-step. And if you have any questions while playing, context-sensitive help is available to make sure you're always on the right track.

Achievements:  Challenge yourself by unlocking a variety of achievements. These achievements range from strategic feats to special challenges.

Recharged Version: The app includes the Recharged version with Against the Trust and MAGA variants that make the gameplay even more diverse and challenging.

Exciting Gameplay: Challenge AI opponents or play against friends in real-time or turn-based.

Online Domination: The Power Grid app allows you to compete against friends or rivals from around the world. The app gives you the opportunity to compete with players from all over the world.

Choose your path: a variety of maps and map variants are available to customize and refine your strategy. Adapt to the specifics of each and outsmart your opponents to get to the top of the power industry.

The Power Grid app has been carefully designed to seamlessly bring the charm of the board game to your smartphone or tablet. The intuitive interface ensures a smooth gaming experience for both experienced players and novices.

Don't miss out on the electrifying fun and challenges offered by the Power Grid app! Download the app now and embark on a journey to conquer the power market one move at a time. Whether you're playing alone and looking for a challenge or you're a player looking to engage in epic duels with friends, the Power Grid app offers all that and more.

us.description:
Requirements of The Last Warlord:
To ensure the game's normal operation, it is required that iOS version should be higher than iOS Version 16 and use iPhone X or X Plus, iPhone 12 or above, or iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 or any iPad Pro to run the game. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/threekingdomsthelastwarlord
Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/577230/discussions/1/

Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord is a turn-based lord-playing strategy game developed by the Chengdu Longyou Studio. The studio created this game world set in the period of the Three Kingdoms mainly based on people's opinions on other games set in that period. The game is very detailed in depicting the differences between various cities and also the abilities and features of the military officers. The game also applies an appealing battle system in which weather, landforms, and many other factors will influence the result of each battle.
The game is based on the famous Chinese historical novel by Luo Guanzhong (about A.D. 1330 - 1400). 

I. Simple and graceful graphics finished by fine-lined drawing
The portrait of every character in the game is finished by fine-lined drawing with the same style as the picture-story books "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". All interfaces of the game are designed in a typical Chinese style.

II. The governing modes are easy to get started with:
There are easy governing modes in the game so that players can manage various affairs easily and spend more time enjoying its other facets. Due to the game's lord-playing mode, players do not need to pay much attention to cities besides their own capital. Instead, they can order prefects to govern other cities and later on give them commands when necessary.

III. A rich variety of gameplay and contents
Over 1,300 officers are available in the game (including those recorded in historical books and novels).
There are up to 30 attributes for officers.
Over 300 features of officers are available.
Over 500 kinds of verified precious items have been applied to the game world for players of different preferences to choose from.
Over 60 cities of different styles and 200 features of cities are available.
There are also abundant techs research and development items.
Its system of combat units contains three main kinds of combat units and about 20 kinds of special combat units.
Ultra abundant official positions.
Numerous simulated natural phenomena, incidents and disasters will highly represent the calamitous period of the Three Kingdoms.
Travelling around will trigger various incidents. 

IV. The turn-based battle mode requires careful planning in deploying troops
Weather, landforms, and even the height of the battlefield will influence any battles in the game.
There's also a siege mechanism with a great gaming environment. There are various siege vehicles for players to storm castles and also defending their own castles. 

V. Other functions
There are also other functions available in the game.
Cloud Save
Steam Cards
The achievement system allows players to collect and show off achievements.

us.releaseNotes:
This update for Strongbox supports importing from more password managers, and fixes a couple of issues with WebDAV and Dropbox hosted databases.

- Strongbox now supports importing from Minimalist & ProtonPass
- Adds the ability to tag credit card fields
- Fixes a bug where concealable fields wouldn’t correctly conceal on save for credit card entries
- Fixes various issues with the iPad experience of Strongbox
- Fixes a crash when adding or opening a Dropbox Database if the account had large amounts of files
- Fixes an issue stopping some users from connecting to their WebDAV databases
- Updates text fields in the WebDAV entry to remove all autocorrection
- Removes hyphens from credit card numbers when autofilling
- Fixes a crash on iOS 18 and below

If you are enjoying the new version of Strongbox it would be great if you could leave a positive review for us in the App Store. It makes a huge difference to us as Indie developers. Thank you!

If you're experiencing any problems or are not happy, just let us know (support@strongboxsafe.com) and we'll make it right.

- The Strongbox Team
us.description:
Strongbox Pro is available here for outright and upfront purchase instead of via an In-App Purchase upgrade. This version of Strongbox is identical to the much loved Strongbox application with all the Pro features and the same regular update schedule.

Strongbox is an application for keeping all your passwords safely stored and protected by one master password. Supporting the open source Password Safe and KeePass formats. 

*** Supports Family Sharing ***

*** Features ***
- Face ID/Touch ID Unlock for the ultimate in convenience, security and speed.

- PIN Code Unlock with a Duress PIN option for those tricky situations.

- Passkey support - The latest, most convenient and most secure authentication method (passkeys).

- YubiKey protection - secure your databases with a hardware token.

- Secure - protected by time tested military grade cryptography.

- Private - Isolated In-App attachments viewer for your sensitive documents, photos & videos.

- Audit your passwords - Automatically check your database for weak passwords including a 'Have I Been Pwned?' check.

- Cloud Support, so you can access your cloud safes using iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV or SFTP even when offline. Use the built in Files app for many other storage options or store them securely only on your local device. You choose your storage.

- Search your entire set of passwords and secrets instantly and powerfully, with deep search. Autocomplete new entries, and auto generate secure passwords. 

- Compatible - Import/Export by Files app, Email, CSV, iTunes File Sharing or use cloud storage.

- Standards compliant - using the time tested Password Safe and KeePass formats so you can import any existing password safe you have.

- Features galore 
   - Incredibly configurable password generation including Diceware (XKCD) & regular passwords.
   - Timed Auto Clear Clipboard.
   - Entry History.
   - KeePass Field References, Tags, Custom Icon & FavIcons (including automatic search & download).
   - Two Factor Authentication codes (TOTP) - QR Code, Steam & Manual.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Strongbox Privacy Policy may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy/
• Strongbox Terms of Use may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms/

us.sellerName: Hangzhou Beesoft Information Technology Co., Ltd.
us.releaseNotes: This is a tiny update that we've improved the app stability to help us serve you better.
us.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

us.releaseNotes:
• Added Quick Entry Autofill support for the ChatGPT Atlas browser.
• Added a workaround for a macOS 26.1 bug where Apple Mail provided malformed links via Quick Entry Autofill.


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for macOS 26 Tahoe, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, control buttons, support for new widget styles, and more.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice a touch of glass in the sidebar that lets a hint of color shine through; increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within macOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: Things’ app icon and widgets now support styles on Mac. To change your style, go to System Settings > Appearance and choose from Dark, Tinted, or Clear.


QUICK CONTROLS

Things’ handy control buttons are now available on Mac. Open Control Center from the menu bar and click Edit Controls. Things offers controls for New To-Do and List (you choose a list). You can place them in Control Center, or directly in your menu bar for one-click access.


AND MORE

• Spotlight can now create to-dos. After you’ve invoked Spotlight (⌘ Space), type “Create To-Do”, press Return, then enter your title. Your new to-do is created in the Inbox – even if Things isn’t running.
• Things’ Quick Entry feature now supports adding links from the new Comet browser.


We hope you enjoy using Things on macOS 26 Tahoe!
us.description:
Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals.

Best of all, it’s easy to use. Within the hour, you’ll have everything off your mind and neatly organized—from routine tasks to your biggest life goals—and you can start focusing on what matters today.

“Things offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.”
—Wirecutter, The New York Times


KEY FEATURES

• Your To-Dos
Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do—each a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps.

• Your Projects
Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There’s also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule.

• Your Areas
Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion.

• Your Plan
Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :)


MORE THINGS TO LOVE

As you dive deeper, you’ll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few:

• Reminders — set a time and Things will remind you.
• Repeaters — automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set.
• This Evening — a special place for your evening plans.
• Calendar integration — see your events and to-dos together.
• Tags — categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists.
• Quick Entry — create to-dos from anywhere, as soon as the thought hits you.
• Quick Find — instantly locate to-dos, headings, or tags.
• Type Travel — jump from list to list with your keyboard; just start typing!
• Widgets — see your lists on the desktop or in Notification Center.
• Mail to Things — forward an email to Things; now it’s a to-do.
• Markdown — structure & style your notes.
• And much more!


MADE FOR MAC

Things is tailored to the Mac with deep system integrations as well. A great example is Quick Entry with Autofill: a shortcut that grabs content from other apps and adds it to Things for you, such as a link to a website or an email you want to get back to.

You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, open multiple windows, add a variety of widgets, import from Reminders—Things can do it all! There’s even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows.


STAY PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO

Things also has full-featured apps for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately). All your devices sync seamlessly via our free Things Cloud service. It’s great to have everything at your fingertips when you need it!


AWARD-WINNING DESIGN

Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection.

“It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.”
—Apple


GET THINGS TODAY

Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do!

Visit our website now and get a free 15-day trial for your Mac: www.things.app

If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

us.releaseNotes:
• Improved the layout of text in expanded to-dos.
• Improved the fade effect when list contents were obscured by system UI elements.
• Adjusted the navigation bar button styles of many dialogs on iOS 26.
• Fixed a bug where some buttons didn’t have the correct border appearance.
• Fixed a bug where scroll indicators would be cut-off by the rounded corners of the window/device.
• Fixed a bug where the expanded to-do toolbar would disappear while presenting the Delete confirmation.
• Fixed a bug where sharing from Apple Maps into Things didn’t work correctly.
• Fixed a bug where, if editing text, Cmd+LeftArrow would navigate back rather than move the cursor to the beginning of the line.
• Fixed a crash that would occur when copying and pasting a to-do from a repeating project into another list (e.g. Today).
• Improved the Todoist importer (now requires iOS 17.4 or later).


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for iOS and watchOS 26, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, more styles for the icon and widgets, and a control button on Apple Watch.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos; and glassy buttons that reflect and refract their surroundings.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within iOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: In addition to the Dark and Tinted styles, iOS 26 introduces Clear – a glass-like style that lets your wallpaper shine through. To change your style on iPhone, long-press your Home Screen, then tap Edit > Customize.


CONTROL BUTTON ON APPLE WATCH

Things’ handy New To-Do control is now available on Apple Watch. Press the side button to reveal Control Center and tap Edit. The control button lets you quickly create a new to-do, via swipe, type, or talk.


We hope you enjoy using Things on iOS 26 and watchOS 26!

Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do!

• Things is also available for Mac, iPad, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately).

If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

us.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button

us.description:
Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It’s a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac — everything stays perfectly in sync.

Task Management

•	Create and manage tasks
•	Add notes and due dates to tasks
•	Organize tasks with tags and filters
•	Paste task lists from other apps

Timer Control

•	Start, pause, or skip intervals
•	Auto-start the next interval (optionally)
•	Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy
•	Manage completed intervals

Timer Customization

•	Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks
•	Define number of intervals before a long break
•	Set a daily goal for completed intervals 
•	Assign different timer settings to individual tasks

Reports

•	View detailed reports to monitor your progress
•	Export your data in CSV format

Sounds and Notifications

•	Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency
•	Variety of alarm sounds
•	Interactive notifications
•	Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer

Integration

•	Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) *
•	Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle **
•	Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow

Quick Access

•	Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen
•	Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island
•	Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button

Automation

•	Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
•	Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app

Device Support

•	Apple Watch support
•	Also available for Mac
•	Dark and Light mode support

* Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately.
** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

us.description:
MiniGames is a collection of new, retro and modern games. You can play on your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad with no Ads!
It's like your own personal games arcade on the go.

This collection of 24 games includes:

■ PONG
Play one of the first video games ever created. This simple tennis like game is an absolute classic. 

■ BRICK BREAK
A fun retro falling brick game. Use the Digital crown or your finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to place the brick. Stack the bricks together to clear a line and score some points.

■ INVADERS
Classic arcade action. Shoot all the space invaders before they get you. Hit the mothership for bonus points.

■ 2048
Enjoy the addictive 2048 game on your watch or phone. Swipe the number tiles around to join them. Join the tiles to reach 2048.

■ TUBE TWIST
Guide your runner down an endless tube. Twist the tube to avoid the holes and spikes. Collect the yellow power orbs, the more you collect the longer you can speed boost. Tap your player to activate your speed boost. Hit the red jumps while boosting to get your bonus score. 

■ BUBBLE
Classic match 3 puzzle game. Connect the bubbles by color to clear them.

■ MISSILE
How long can you survive a deadly onslaught of homing missiles? Maneuver your fighter plane to avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other. 

■ HOP
Jump from platform to platform to gain more height and points. Shoot the winged baddies along the way.

■ Drift
Enjoy high octane drifting down a treacherous road. One false move and down you go. Try and survive as long as you can to get the top score. Collect the stars for bonus points.

■ Cong
It's like pong, but in a circle. Use the digital crown to move the paddle around the circle and keep the ball in play.

■ Tower
Build your Tower by stacking colourful blocks on top of each other. Place them perfectly for bonus points.

■ FLAP
Guide the bird through a never ending forest by flapping your wings.

■ FROG ROAD
Help the cute frogs avoid the cars and cross the road. A 3D update to the classic Frogger game.

■ BLOCK RUN
Feel like going for a a run? Help the voxel guy avoid the colourful obstacles by jumping, rolling and turning around the corners.

■ MATCHTRIS
A mashup of Tetris and Dr. Mario. Move the falling blocks to match 4 or more colors to clear them. Setup the blocks to fall and match for combos and extra points.

■ DRONE
Pilot your drone down the never ending corridors of an Alien spaceship.

■ THRUST
Strap your rocket boots on and zoom down a dark cave. Thrust combines a classic cave flyer game with elements of flappy bird.

■ SUPER JUMP
We’ve taken the fun of the humble platformer game and mashed it with an endless runner. Keep your player running by jumping over holes, ditches and enemies. Collect fruit to score points and the more you score the faster you run. 

■ RETRO RACER
Inspired by pseudo 3d racing games like Outrun and Pole Position but with modern graphics. Enjoy the surreal, exhilarating sense of speed while you race to beat the clock.

Please note this game requires a watch series 4 or newer.

■ CONTRA PANG
A mashup of Contra’s shooting action and the bubble popping fun of Pang.

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
A new twist to the classic Space Invaders. With a unique circular design and lots of power-ups.

■ MOON SNAKE
We took the classic fruit eating snake and put him on the moon. Avoid the bombs and your own tail to survive. 

■ DUAL BREAK
What could be better than the classic paddle game Breakout? How about power-ups and an extra paddle to control.

■ CIRCLE BREAK
It’s like Pong in a Circle meets Breakout. Keep the ball from leaving the circle and break all the obstacles to finish the stage.

Features:
• No ads!
• Apple Watch support
• Screen shake

tr.description:
Slash your way through the hordes of darkness and defeat King Valor's fearsome guardians in this breathtaking adventure!

"Chaining together a slick series of attacks, dodges, and jumps, is incredibly satisfying." — PocketGamer

"I suspect mobile gaming fans will be playing and replaying this one for years to come." — TouchArcade, 5/5

A malicious power stirs in the forgotten kingdom of Vallaris. Tasked with discovering the fate of its lost king, your quest quickly takes a sinister turn and you are cast into darkness. Surrounded and outnumbered, you must grab your sword, steel your temper and fight your way through a land that does not welcome you. Except for the friendly merchant - he's grateful for your business.

ABOUT THE GAME
Grimvalor is a challenging hack & slash platformer with fast-paced combat in a dark fantasy world. Take control of a lone warrior on a quest to restore a corrupted realm. Embark on a journey through atmospheric landscapes and dungeons in a massive story-driven premium experience.

COMBAT & EXPLORATION
Master skill-based combat, learn enemy patterns and bring them down with all your fury. Explore the shattered lands of Vallaris, find and upgrade equipment and level up your character. Face the legacy of King Valor's madness and prevail!

FEATURES
• Epic boss fights
• Stunning 3D visuals accelerated by Metal graphics
• Accurate and customizable touch controls
• Full support for MFi game controllers
• Use iCloud to keep your saves in sync between devices.
• Play offline - perfect for commute.
• No ads or in-app purchases

tr.releaseNotes:
This update for Strongbox supports importing from more password managers, and fixes a couple of issues with WebDAV and Dropbox hosted databases.

- Strongbox now supports importing from Minimalist & ProtonPass
- Adds the ability to tag credit card fields
- Fixes a bug where concealable fields wouldn’t correctly conceal on save for credit card entries
- Fixes various issues with the iPad experience of Strongbox
- Fixes a crash when adding or opening a Dropbox Database if the account had large amounts of files
- Fixes an issue stopping some users from connecting to their WebDAV databases
- Updates text fields in the WebDAV entry to remove all autocorrection
- Removes hyphens from credit card numbers when autofilling
- Fixes a crash on iOS 18 and below

If you are enjoying the new version of Strongbox it would be great if you could leave a positive review for us in the App Store. It makes a huge difference to us as Indie developers. Thank you!

If you're experiencing any problems or are not happy, just let us know (support@strongboxsafe.com) and we'll make it right.

- The Strongbox Team
tr.description:
Strongbox Pro is available here for outright and upfront purchase instead of via an In-App Purchase upgrade. This version of Strongbox is identical to the much loved Strongbox application with all the Pro features and the same regular update schedule.

Strongbox is an application for keeping all your passwords safely stored and protected by one master password. Supporting the open source Password Safe and KeePass formats. 

*** Supports Family Sharing ***

*** Features ***
- Face ID/Touch ID Unlock for the ultimate in convenience, security and speed.

- PIN Code Unlock with a Duress PIN option for those tricky situations.

- Passkey support - The latest, most convenient and most secure authentication method (passkeys).

- YubiKey protection - secure your databases with a hardware token.

- Secure - protected by time tested military grade cryptography.

- Private - Isolated In-App attachments viewer for your sensitive documents, photos & videos.

- Audit your passwords - Automatically check your database for weak passwords including a 'Have I Been Pwned?' check.

- Cloud Support, so you can access your cloud safes using iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV or SFTP even when offline. Use the built in Files app for many other storage options or store them securely only on your local device. You choose your storage.

- Search your entire set of passwords and secrets instantly and powerfully, with deep search. Autocomplete new entries, and auto generate secure passwords. 

- Compatible - Import/Export by Files app, Email, CSV, iTunes File Sharing or use cloud storage.

- Standards compliant - using the time tested Password Safe and KeePass formats so you can import any existing password safe you have.

- Features galore 
   - Incredibly configurable password generation including Diceware (XKCD) & regular passwords.
   - Timed Auto Clear Clipboard.
   - Entry History.
   - KeePass Field References, Tags, Custom Icon & FavIcons (including automatic search & download).
   - Two Factor Authentication codes (TOTP) - QR Code, Steam & Manual.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Strongbox Privacy Policy may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy/
• Strongbox Terms of Use may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms/

tr.description:
RCS: Real Combat Simulator – Rule the Skies!
The Ultimate Military Flight Combat Experience on Mobile

Take control in the most advanced military flight simulator: pilot legendary fighter jets, engage in epic dogfights, master air-to-air and air-to-ground combat, and prove your skill as an elite combat pilot.

Fly and Fight Anywhere in the World!

-Master takeoffs, landings, and full combat missions
-Pilot state-of-the-art jets with realistic avionics and detailed cockpits
-Access thousands of global airports and military airbases
-Train with interactive tutorials and sharpen your combat skills

Realistic Fighter Jets:
Fly faithfully recreated aircraft with dynamic cockpits, authentic flight physics, and full weapons systems
-A-10C Thunderbolt II – The armored close-air-support powerhouse, featuring the GAU-8 Avenger cannon and precision strike capability.
-F/A-18 Super Hornet – A versatile carrier-based multirole jet with advanced avionics and a wide weapons loadout, perfect for dogfighting and precision strikes.
-M-346FA Master – A modern, agile fighter-trainer equipped with digital displays and advanced sensors.
-F-16C Fighting Falcon – The iconic multirole fighter, prized for its speed, agility, and versatility. Equipped with advanced radar, fly-by-wire controls, and a wide array of precision air-to-air and air-to-ground weapons.
More aircraft coming soon!

Immersive Combat Features:
-Global battle zones with real-world weather and time-of-day effects
-Advanced radar and targeting systems for air and ground threats
-Full arsenal of missiles, bombs, cannons, and countermeasures
-High-speed maneuvers and satellite-based terrain

Mission Editor & Multiplayer:
-Create custom missions: set objectives, control weather, and define enemy AI
-Build your own lobbies, design scenarios, and fly missions together in real-time multiplayer
-Choose Your Battlefield – Select from realistic global locations and military airbases.
-Share your creations and relive your best battles with advanced replay tools

Personalize Your Experience:
-Customize your jet with authentic liveries and camo patterns
-Capture cinematic dogfights with advanced in-game cameras
-Share your combat highlights with the RCS community

An internet connection is required for full simulation and multiplayer features. Some features may require a subscription.

Download now the ultimate military flight simulator! Fly modern fighter jets, join intense air combat missions, and dominate the skies in RCS: Real Combat Simulator.

Support: rcs@rortos.com

tr.description:
The ultimate system monitor, seamlessly integrated into your menubar.

iStat Menus covers a huge range of stats, including CPU, GPU, memory, network usage, disk usage, time, battery, weather and more. iStat Menus 7 is a full reboot, sporting an all-new design with hundreds of big and small improvements. iStat Menus is unmatched in efficiency, and is the most CPU-friendly system monitoring app.

• CPU and GPU •

Highly detailed CPU info, with current usage for individual cores, history graphs, load averages, uptime, CPU frequency, and a list of the apps using the most CPU. Efficiency and performance cores can be styled differently. Plus, GPU processor, memory, temperature, and frequency on supported Macs.

• Weather • Requires a paid weather subscription •

Quickly glance at current conditions in your menu bar, or dive into an incredibly detailed hourly forecast and weekly weather overview, covering low and high temperature, wind speed and direction, chance of rain, humidity, dew point, UV index, pressure, visibility and more.

• Memory •

Extensive memory stats covering usage, history, memory pressure, compressed memory, swap, and a list of the apps using the most memory.

• Rules •

iStat Menus can notify you of an incredibly wide range of events, based on CPU, GPU, memory, disks, network, sensors, battery, power and weather. This lets you be notified when your public IP has changed, if your internet connection is down, if CPU usage is above 60% for more than 10 seconds, if disk space is low, or a near-infinite range of other options.

• Disk usage and activity •

See used space, free space, and disk activity in your menu bar. S.M.A.R.T. status monitoring, per app disk usage, and more detail for all your disks is only a click away.

• Network •

Keep on top of what’s being sent and received for all network connections with history graphs, current bandwidth usage, and a bandwidth breakdown for the top apps, as well as detailed connection info, bandwidth graphs, public and private IP addresses, and an internet connectivity indicator.

• Battery and power •

Detailed info on your battery’s current state and a highly configurable menu item that can change if you’re draining, charging, or completely charged. Plus, battery levels for Bluetooth devices.

• Sensors •

A realtime listing of the sensors in your Mac, including temperatures, hard drive temperatures (where supported), fans, CPU frequency, GPU frequency (where supported), voltages, current and power. Fan speeds can be controlled, and even switched or gradually ramped based on temperatures and battery state.

• Date and time •

Highly customisable menu bar clocks, a calendar with upcoming events, and world clocks with detailed sun and moon info. Each world clock can have a custom name, to make it easier to see the time for coworkers or family members.

• Combined •

Combined mode combines multiple iStat Menus items into a single menu bar item. You can choose what’s shown in the menu bar and what’s shown in the menu, allowing you to save space in the menu bar while still having access to all the information. It’s super handy on laptops.

Privacy policy:
https://bjango.com/privacy/

Terms of use:
https://bjango.com/help/istatmenus7/licenseagreement/

tr.description:
Whisper Notes - Offline Speech to Text

Record voice or import audio/video files, get accurate transcripts—100% offline, on-device.
No recording limits, no subscriptions, no cloud uploads. Just $4.99, once.

■ Core Features
- 100% offline transcription—your audio never leaves your device
- Record voice memos, meetings, lectures—unlimited length
- Import audio/video files (MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV)—transcribe offline
- Extract subtitles from videos in your Camera Roll—no upload needed
- 100+ languages supported, auto-detected
- Export with timestamps (SRT, VTT, TXT)
- Batch process multiple files

■ Privacy & Speed
Your recordings stay on your iPhone/Mac, always. No internet needed, no cloud uploads, ever.

Transcription speed: On iPhone 15, 5 minutes of audio takes about 1 minute. Older devices are slower but work fine.

■ Pricing
$4.99 one-time. Most similar apps charge $100+/year in subscriptions.
No recurring fees, no in-app purchases, no ads. Pay once, use forever.
Not satisfied? Tap Settings → Request Refund.

■ Common Questions

Does it work completely offline?
Yes. Your audio never leaves your device. Works on flights, in remote areas, anywhere.

Is there a recording time limit?
No limit. Record for hours if you want. Longer recordings just take more time to transcribe on your device.

Does it support real-time transcription while recording?
Not during recording, but yes during transcription—after you finish recording, you'll see the transcript appear in real-time as it's being generated.

Where is my data stored?
Only on your device. We have zero access. Note: If you delete the app, your recordings are deleted too (because we don't keep secret backups). Please export important files regularly.

Why no AI summaries?
Privacy. We never upload your recordings to any AI service. Want summaries? Copy the transcript and use your preferred AI tool. We don't lock your data into a proprietary AI system.

Why does transcription stop when I switch apps?
iOS limits background GPU usage for third-party apps. Just return to the app and tap "Re-transcribe"—it will restart.

Can I import existing audio/video files?
Yes. Import MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV files and transcribe them offline. Great for extracting subtitles from videos without uploading to cloud services.

What languages are supported?
100+ languages including: English, Deutsch, Español, Русский, 한국어, Français, 日本語, Português, Türkçe, Polski, Català, Nederlands, Arabic, Svenska, Italiano, Bahasa Indonesia, Hindi, Suomi, Tiếng Việt, Hebrew, Українська, Greek, Bahasa Melayu, Čeština, Română, Dansk, Magyar, Tamil, Norsk, Thai, Urdu, Hrvatski, Bulgarian, Lietuvių, Latina, Māori, Malayalam, Cymraeg, Slovenčina, Telugu, Persian, Latviešu, Bengali, Српски, Azərbaycan, Slovenščina, Kannada, Eesti, Macedonian, Brezhoneg, Euskara, Íslenska, Armenian, Nepali, Mongolian, Bosanski, Kazakh, Shqip, Kiswahili, Galego, Marathi, Punjabi, Sinhala, Khmer, chiShona, Yorùbá, Soomaali, Afrikaans, Occitan, Georgian, Belarusian, Tajik, Sindhi, Gujarati, Amharic, Yiddish, Lao, Uzbek, Føroyskt, Kreyòl Ayisyen, Pashto, Turkmen, Nynorsk, Malti, Sanskrit, Luxembourgish, Myanmar, Tibetan, Tagalog, Malagasy, Assamese, Tatar, Hawaiian, Lingala, Hausa, Bashkir, Javanese, Sundanese, 简体中文, 繁體中文

■ Contact
Questions? Email support@whispernotes.app
Learn more: whispernotes.app

tr.releaseNotes:
• Added Quick Entry Autofill support for the ChatGPT Atlas browser.
• Added a workaround for a macOS 26.1 bug where Apple Mail provided malformed links via Quick Entry Autofill.


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for macOS 26 Tahoe, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, control buttons, support for new widget styles, and more.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice a touch of glass in the sidebar that lets a hint of color shine through; increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within macOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: Things’ app icon and widgets now support styles on Mac. To change your style, go to System Settings > Appearance and choose from Dark, Tinted, or Clear.


QUICK CONTROLS

Things’ handy control buttons are now available on Mac. Open Control Center from the menu bar and click Edit Controls. Things offers controls for New To-Do and List (you choose a list). You can place them in Control Center, or directly in your menu bar for one-click access.


AND MORE

• Spotlight can now create to-dos. After you’ve invoked Spotlight (⌘ Space), type “Create To-Do”, press Return, then enter your title. Your new to-do is created in the Inbox – even if Things isn’t running.
• Things’ Quick Entry feature now supports adding links from the new Comet browser.


We hope you enjoy using Things on macOS 26 Tahoe!
tr.description:
Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals.

Best of all, it’s easy to use. Within the hour, you’ll have everything off your mind and neatly organized—from routine tasks to your biggest life goals—and you can start focusing on what matters today.

“Things offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.”
—Wirecutter, The New York Times


KEY FEATURES

• Your To-Dos
Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do—each a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps.

• Your Projects
Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There’s also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule.

• Your Areas
Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion.

• Your Plan
Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :)


MORE THINGS TO LOVE

As you dive deeper, you’ll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few:

• Reminders — set a time and Things will remind you.
• Repeaters — automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set.
• This Evening — a special place for your evening plans.
• Calendar integration — see your events and to-dos together.
• Tags — categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists.
• Quick Entry — create to-dos from anywhere, as soon as the thought hits you.
• Quick Find — instantly locate to-dos, headings, or tags.
• Type Travel — jump from list to list with your keyboard; just start typing!
• Widgets — see your lists on the desktop or in Notification Center.
• Mail to Things — forward an email to Things; now it’s a to-do.
• Markdown — structure & style your notes.
• And much more!


MADE FOR MAC

Things is tailored to the Mac with deep system integrations as well. A great example is Quick Entry with Autofill: a shortcut that grabs content from other apps and adds it to Things for you, such as a link to a website or an email you want to get back to.

You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, open multiple windows, add a variety of widgets, import from Reminders—Things can do it all! There’s even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows.


STAY PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO

Things also has full-featured apps for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately). All your devices sync seamlessly via our free Things Cloud service. It’s great to have everything at your fingertips when you need it!


AWARD-WINNING DESIGN

Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection.

“It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.”
—Apple


GET THINGS TODAY

Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do!

Visit our website now and get a free 15-day trial for your Mac: www.things.app

If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

tr.releaseNotes:
• Improved the layout of text in expanded to-dos.
• Improved the fade effect when list contents were obscured by system UI elements.
• Adjusted the navigation bar button styles of many dialogs on iOS 26.
• Fixed a bug where some buttons didn’t have the correct border appearance.
• Fixed a bug where scroll indicators would be cut-off by the rounded corners of the window/device.
• Fixed a bug where the expanded to-do toolbar would disappear while presenting the Delete confirmation.
• Fixed a bug where sharing from Apple Maps into Things didn’t work correctly.
• Fixed a bug where, if editing text, Cmd+LeftArrow would navigate back rather than move the cursor to the beginning of the line.
• Fixed a crash that would occur when copying and pasting a to-do from a repeating project into another list (e.g. Today).
• Improved the Todoist importer (now requires iOS 17.4 or later).


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for iOS and watchOS 26, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, more styles for the icon and widgets, and a control button on Apple Watch.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos; and glassy buttons that reflect and refract their surroundings.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within iOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: In addition to the Dark and Tinted styles, iOS 26 introduces Clear – a glass-like style that lets your wallpaper shine through. To change your style on iPhone, long-press your Home Screen, then tap Edit > Customize.


CONTROL BUTTON ON APPLE WATCH

Things’ handy New To-Do control is now available on Apple Watch. Press the side button to reveal Control Center and tap Edit. The control button lets you quickly create a new to-do, via swipe, type, or talk.


We hope you enjoy using Things on iOS 26 and watchOS 26!

tr.releaseNotes:
- New: You can now read and clear the error memory of the engine control unit through CarPlay.
- Fixed: Connection issue with unresponsive control units.
tr.description:
BimmerLink is the direct link to your BMW or MINI. Using one of the supported OBD adapters, you can read trouble codes or display sensor values in realtime, check the current state of the DPF in your car or register a new battery after replacement. BimmerLink even allows you to remotely control the exhaust flap or mute the Active Sound Design in your car.

READ AND CLEAR TROUBLE CODES
Diagnose your car as would otherwise be possible only by your Service Partner. In contrast to generic OBD apps that read emission related errors only, BimmerLink allows you to read and clear trouble codes from ALL control units in your car.

DISPLAY REALTIME SENSOR VALUES
BimmerLink provides a big selection of values like oil temperature or boost pressure. Keep an eye on all the important parameters of your car with a personalized dashboard.

EXHAUST FLAP REMOTE CONTROL*
Take control over the exhaust flap in your car and decide yourself, whether it should be closed or open.

ACTIVE SOUND DESIGN**
If you do not like the artificial engine sound generated in your car, just mute the Active Sound Design with BimmerLink.

SOUND TUNING***
The “Sound Tuning” option allows you to disable the “exhaust burble“ in cars equipped with the S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4).

DPF REGENERATION****
BimmerLink allows you to check the current state of the diesel particulate filter in your car. Find out when the last regeneration took place or how much ash has accumulated in the filter and start a regeneration with the touch of a button.

CARPLAY ADD-ON*****
Enhance your driving experience with the CarPlay add-on for BimmerLink. Access your sensor values on your car's display for improved vehicle monitoring, all integrated seamlessly with CarPlay for ease of use.

BATTERY REGISTRATION
If you want to replace the battery in your car, this has to be registered in the engine control unit and BimmerLink allows you to do this yourself now.

PARKING BRAKE SERVICE MODE
BimmerLink allows you to activate the service mode for the electromechanical parking brake.

SERVICE RESET
Reset the service display in your car after carrying out maintenance work like a brake pad replacement or an engine oil change.

RESET SHORT CIRCUIT LOCKS
Unlock lamp outputs that were disabled due to a short circuit.

TRANSMISSION ADAPTATION VALUES
Check the adaptation values of the ZF 8HP automatic transmission in your vehicle.

REQUIRED ACCESSORIES
To use the app, one of the supported Bluetooth or WiFi OBD adapters or cables is required. For more information please visit https://bimmerlink.app.

SUPPORTED CARS
- 1 Series (2004+)
- 2 Series, M2 (2013+)
- 2 Series Active Tourer (2014+)
- 2 Series Gran Tourer (2015+)
- 3 Series, M3 (2005+)
- 4 Series, M4 (2013+)
- 5 Series, M5 (2003+)
- 6 Series, M6 (2003+)
- 7 Series (2008+)
- 8 Series (2018+)
- X1 (2009+)
- X2 (2018+)
- X3, X3 M (2010+)
- X4, X4 M (2014+)
- X5, X5 M (2006+)
- X6, X6 M (2008+)
- X7 (2019+)
- Z4 (2009+)
- i3 (2013+)
- i4 (2021+)
- i7 (2022+)
- i8 (2013+)
- iX (2021+)
- iX1 (2022+)
- iX3 (2021+)
- MINI (2006+)
- Toyota Supra (2019+)

* Only for cars that are equipped with an exhaust flap by factory.
** Only for cars that are equipped with the “Active Sound Design“ by factory.
*** Only for cars with S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4).
**** Only for cars with a diesel engine.
***** Additional in-app purchase required.
