tr.description:
Dive into the world of the energy industry with the Power Grid app, designed by award-winning author Friedemann Friese.

Global Domination: Conquer energy markets worldwide on maps such as USA, Germany, France, Benelux, Eastern Europe, South Africa, Italy and the Middle East. Each map brings unique gameplay that will put your strategic skills to the test.

Tutorial & Help: Whether you're an experienced Power Grid player or a beginner, the game features a detailed tutorial that walks you through the basics step-by-step. And if you have any questions while playing, context-sensitive help is available to make sure you're always on the right track.

Achievements:  Challenge yourself by unlocking a variety of achievements. These achievements range from strategic feats to special challenges.

Recharged Version: The app includes the Recharged version with Against the Trust and MAGA variants that make the gameplay even more diverse and challenging.

Exciting Gameplay: Challenge AI opponents or play against friends in real-time or turn-based.

Online Domination: The Power Grid app allows you to compete against friends or rivals from around the world. The app gives you the opportunity to compete with players from all over the world.

Choose your path: a variety of maps and map variants are available to customize and refine your strategy. Adapt to the specifics of each and outsmart your opponents to get to the top of the power industry.

The Power Grid app has been carefully designed to seamlessly bring the charm of the board game to your smartphone or tablet. The intuitive interface ensures a smooth gaming experience for both experienced players and novices.

Don't miss out on the electrifying fun and challenges offered by the Power Grid app! Download the app now and embark on a journey to conquer the power market one move at a time. Whether you're playing alone and looking for a challenge or you're a player looking to engage in epic duels with friends, the Power Grid app offers all that and more.

tr.description:
Requirements of The Last Warlord:
To ensure the game's normal operation, it is required that iOS version should be higher than iOS Version 16 and use iPhone X or X Plus, iPhone 12 or above, or iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 or any iPad Pro to run the game. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/threekingdomsthelastwarlord
Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/577230/discussions/1/

Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord is a turn-based lord-playing strategy game developed by the Chengdu Longyou Studio. The studio created this game world set in the period of the Three Kingdoms mainly based on people's opinions on other games set in that period. The game is very detailed in depicting the differences between various cities and also the abilities and features of the military officers. The game also applies an appealing battle system in which weather, landforms, and many other factors will influence the result of each battle.
The game is based on the famous Chinese historical novel by Luo Guanzhong (about A.D. 1330 - 1400). 

I. Simple and graceful graphics finished by fine-lined drawing
The portrait of every character in the game is finished by fine-lined drawing with the same style as the picture-story books "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". All interfaces of the game are designed in a typical Chinese style.

II. The governing modes are easy to get started with:
There are easy governing modes in the game so that players can manage various affairs easily and spend more time enjoying its other facets. Due to the game's lord-playing mode, players do not need to pay much attention to cities besides their own capital. Instead, they can order prefects to govern other cities and later on give them commands when necessary.

III. A rich variety of gameplay and contents
Over 1,300 officers are available in the game (including those recorded in historical books and novels).
There are up to 30 attributes for officers.
Over 300 features of officers are available.
Over 500 kinds of verified precious items have been applied to the game world for players of different preferences to choose from.
Over 60 cities of different styles and 200 features of cities are available.
There are also abundant techs research and development items.
Its system of combat units contains three main kinds of combat units and about 20 kinds of special combat units.
Ultra abundant official positions.
Numerous simulated natural phenomena, incidents and disasters will highly represent the calamitous period of the Three Kingdoms.
Travelling around will trigger various incidents. 

IV. The turn-based battle mode requires careful planning in deploying troops
Weather, landforms, and even the height of the battlefield will influence any battles in the game.
There's also a siege mechanism with a great gaming environment. There are various siege vehicles for players to storm castles and also defending their own castles. 

V. Other functions
There are also other functions available in the game.
Cloud Save
Steam Cards
The achievement system allows players to collect and show off achievements.

tr.sellerName: Hangzhou Beesoft Information Technology Co., Ltd.
tr.releaseNotes: This is a tiny update that we've improved the app stability to help us serve you better.
tr.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

tr.releaseNotes:
• Added Quick Entry Autofill support for the ChatGPT Atlas browser.
• Added a workaround for a macOS 26.1 bug where Apple Mail provided malformed links via Quick Entry Autofill.


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for macOS 26 Tahoe, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, control buttons, support for new widget styles, and more.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice a touch of glass in the sidebar that lets a hint of color shine through; increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within macOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: Things’ app icon and widgets now support styles on Mac. To change your style, go to System Settings > Appearance and choose from Dark, Tinted, or Clear.


QUICK CONTROLS

Things’ handy control buttons are now available on Mac. Open Control Center from the menu bar and click Edit Controls. Things offers controls for New To-Do and List (you choose a list). You can place them in Control Center, or directly in your menu bar for one-click access.


AND MORE

• Spotlight can now create to-dos. After you’ve invoked Spotlight (⌘ Space), type “Create To-Do”, press Return, then enter your title. Your new to-do is created in the Inbox – even if Things isn’t running.
• Things’ Quick Entry feature now supports adding links from the new Comet browser.


We hope you enjoy using Things on macOS 26 Tahoe!
tr.description:
Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals.

Best of all, it’s easy to use. Within the hour, you’ll have everything off your mind and neatly organized—from routine tasks to your biggest life goals—and you can start focusing on what matters today.

“Things offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.”
—Wirecutter, The New York Times


KEY FEATURES

• Your To-Dos
Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do—each a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps.

• Your Projects
Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There’s also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule.

• Your Areas
Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion.

• Your Plan
Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :)


MORE THINGS TO LOVE

As you dive deeper, you’ll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few:

• Reminders — set a time and Things will remind you.
• Repeaters — automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set.
• This Evening — a special place for your evening plans.
• Calendar integration — see your events and to-dos together.
• Tags — categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists.
• Quick Entry — create to-dos from anywhere, as soon as the thought hits you.
• Quick Find — instantly locate to-dos, headings, or tags.
• Type Travel — jump from list to list with your keyboard; just start typing!
• Widgets — see your lists on the desktop or in Notification Center.
• Mail to Things — forward an email to Things; now it’s a to-do.
• Markdown — structure & style your notes.
• And much more!


MADE FOR MAC

Things is tailored to the Mac with deep system integrations as well. A great example is Quick Entry with Autofill: a shortcut that grabs content from other apps and adds it to Things for you, such as a link to a website or an email you want to get back to.

You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, open multiple windows, add a variety of widgets, import from Reminders—Things can do it all! There’s even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows.


STAY PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO

Things also has full-featured apps for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately). All your devices sync seamlessly via our free Things Cloud service. It’s great to have everything at your fingertips when you need it!


AWARD-WINNING DESIGN

Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection.

“It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.”
—Apple


GET THINGS TODAY

Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do!

Visit our website now and get a free 15-day trial for your Mac: www.things.app

If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

tr.releaseNotes:
• Improved the layout of text in expanded to-dos.
• Improved the fade effect when list contents were obscured by system UI elements.
• Adjusted the navigation bar button styles of many dialogs on iOS 26.
• Fixed a bug where some buttons didn’t have the correct border appearance.
• Fixed a bug where scroll indicators would be cut-off by the rounded corners of the window/device.
• Fixed a bug where the expanded to-do toolbar would disappear while presenting the Delete confirmation.
• Fixed a bug where sharing from Apple Maps into Things didn’t work correctly.
• Fixed a bug where, if editing text, Cmd+LeftArrow would navigate back rather than move the cursor to the beginning of the line.
• Fixed a crash that would occur when copying and pasting a to-do from a repeating project into another list (e.g. Today).
• Improved the Todoist importer (now requires iOS 17.4 or later).


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for iOS and watchOS 26, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, more styles for the icon and widgets, and a control button on Apple Watch.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos; and glassy buttons that reflect and refract their surroundings.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within iOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: In addition to the Dark and Tinted styles, iOS 26 introduces Clear – a glass-like style that lets your wallpaper shine through. To change your style on iPhone, long-press your Home Screen, then tap Edit > Customize.


CONTROL BUTTON ON APPLE WATCH

Things’ handy New To-Do control is now available on Apple Watch. Press the side button to reveal Control Center and tap Edit. The control button lets you quickly create a new to-do, via swipe, type, or talk.


We hope you enjoy using Things on iOS 26 and watchOS 26!

tr.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button
• Integrate with the Shortcuts app to automate workflow (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
• Trigger Shortcuts automatically on specific events in Be Focused
• Multiple fixes and improvements
tr.description:
Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It’s a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac — everything stays perfectly in sync.

Task Management

•	Create and manage tasks
•	Add notes and due dates to tasks
•	Organize tasks with tags and filters
•	Paste task lists from other apps

Timer Control

•	Start, pause, or skip intervals
•	Auto-start the next interval (optionally)
•	Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy
•	Manage completed intervals

Timer Customization

•	Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks
•	Define number of intervals before a long break
•	Set a daily goal for completed intervals 
•	Assign different timer settings to individual tasks

Reports

•	View detailed reports to monitor your progress
•	Export your data in CSV format

Sounds and Notifications

•	Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency
•	Variety of alarm sounds
•	Interactive notifications
•	Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer

Integration

•	Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) *
•	Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle **
•	Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow

Quick Access

•	Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen
•	Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island
•	Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button

Automation

•	Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
•	Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app

Device Support

•	Apple Watch support
•	Also available for Mac
•	Dark and Light mode support

* Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately.
** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

Build defensive Towers to defeat the Invading Horde. 
Complete levels to earn Stars to upgrade your Weapons, Obstacles and Magic.
Earn Gems to unlock more Towers, Obstacles and Magic. 

Features

● Quirky story line

● Unlock powerful new Towers, Obstacles, Items and Magic

tr.description:
MiniGames is a collection of new, retro and modern games. You can play on your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad with no Ads!
It's like your own personal games arcade on the go.

This collection of 24 games includes:

■ PONG
Play one of the first video games ever created. This simple tennis like game is an absolute classic. 

■ BRICK BREAK
A fun retro falling brick game. Use the Digital crown or your finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to place the brick. Stack the bricks together to clear a line and score some points.

■ INVADERS
Classic arcade action. Shoot all the space invaders before they get you. Hit the mothership for bonus points.

■ 2048
Enjoy the addictive 2048 game on your watch or phone. Swipe the number tiles around to join them. Join the tiles to reach 2048.

■ TUBE TWIST
Guide your runner down an endless tube. Twist the tube to avoid the holes and spikes. Collect the yellow power orbs, the more you collect the longer you can speed boost. Tap your player to activate your speed boost. Hit the red jumps while boosting to get your bonus score. 

■ BUBBLE
Classic match 3 puzzle game. Connect the bubbles by color to clear them.

■ MISSILE
How long can you survive a deadly onslaught of homing missiles? Maneuver your fighter plane to avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other. 

■ HOP
Jump from platform to platform to gain more height and points. Shoot the winged baddies along the way.

■ Drift
Enjoy high octane drifting down a treacherous road. One false move and down you go. Try and survive as long as you can to get the top score. Collect the stars for bonus points.

■ Cong
It's like pong, but in a circle. Use the digital crown to move the paddle around the circle and keep the ball in play.

■ Tower
Build your Tower by stacking colourful blocks on top of each other. Place them perfectly for bonus points.

■ FLAP
Guide the bird through a never ending forest by flapping your wings.

■ FROG ROAD
Help the cute frogs avoid the cars and cross the road. A 3D update to the classic Frogger game.

■ BLOCK RUN
Feel like going for a a run? Help the voxel guy avoid the colourful obstacles by jumping, rolling and turning around the corners.

■ MATCHTRIS
A mashup of Tetris and Dr. Mario. Move the falling blocks to match 4 or more colors to clear them. Setup the blocks to fall and match for combos and extra points.

■ DRONE
Pilot your drone down the never ending corridors of an Alien spaceship.

■ THRUST
Strap your rocket boots on and zoom down a dark cave. Thrust combines a classic cave flyer game with elements of flappy bird.

■ SUPER JUMP
We’ve taken the fun of the humble platformer game and mashed it with an endless runner. Keep your player running by jumping over holes, ditches and enemies. Collect fruit to score points and the more you score the faster you run. 

■ RETRO RACER
Inspired by pseudo 3d racing games like Outrun and Pole Position but with modern graphics. Enjoy the surreal, exhilarating sense of speed while you race to beat the clock.

Please note this game requires a watch series 4 or newer.

■ CONTRA PANG
A mashup of Contra’s shooting action and the bubble popping fun of Pang.

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
A new twist to the classic Space Invaders. With a unique circular design and lots of power-ups.

■ MOON SNAKE
We took the classic fruit eating snake and put him on the moon. Avoid the bombs and your own tail to survive. 

■ DUAL BREAK
What could be better than the classic paddle game Breakout? How about power-ups and an extra paddle to control.

■ CIRCLE BREAK
It’s like Pong in a Circle meets Breakout. Keep the ball from leaving the circle and break all the obstacles to finish the stage.

Features:
• No ads!
• Apple Watch support
• Screen shake
• Vibrations
• Sound Effects 
• Music
• Leaderboards

pt.description:
Abra o seu caminho através das hordas da escuridão e derrote os temíveis guardiões do Rei Valor nesta aventura de RPG de tirar o fôlego!

"Encadear uma série de ataques, desvios e saltos é incrivelmente satisfatório". - PocketGamer

"Eu suspeito que os fãs de jogos para dispositivos móveis jogarão este nos próximos anos". - TouchArcade, 5/5

Um poder malicioso se agita no reino esquecido de Vallaris. Você foi encarregado de descobrir o destino do rei perdido, mas rapidamente a sua missão toma um rumo sinistro e você é lançado na escuridão. Cercado e em menor número, você deve pegar sua espada, fortalecer seu temperamento e abrir caminho por uma terra onde você não é bem-vindo. Exceto por um comerciante amigável, pois ele é grato pelo seu negócio.

SOBRE O JOGO
O Grimvalor é um jogo de plataforma desafiador de hack-and-slash com combate em ritmo acelerado em um mundo sombrio de fantasia. Assuma o controle de um guerreiro solitário que tem a missão de restaurar um reino corrompido. Embarque em uma jornada por meio de paisagens atmosféricas e masmorras em uma enorme experiência premium baseada em histórias.

COMBATE E EXPLORAÇÃO
Domine o combate baseado em habilidades, aprenda os padrões de inimigos e derrube-os com toda a sua fúria. Explore as terras destruídas de Vallaris, encontre e melhore os equipamentos e leve seu personagem ao próximo nível. Encare o legado da loucura do rei Valor e prevaleça!

RECURSOS
• Lutas épicas com chefes
• Visuais 3D impressionantes, acelerados pelos gráficos de Metal
• Renderização Silky 120 FPS suave em dispositivos iPad Pro da 2° e 3° geração
• Controles com toque precisos e personalizáveis
• Suporte completo para controladores de jogos MFi
• Use o iCloud para salvar e mantenha a sincronização entre dispositivos.
• Jogue offline - perfeito para comutar.
• Não há anúncios ou compras no aplicativo

pt.releaseNotes:
Esta atualização do Strongbox suporta importação de mais gerenciadores de senhas e corrige alguns problemas com bancos de dados hospedados no WebDAV e Dropbox.

- Strongbox agora suporta importação do Minimalist & ProtonPass
- Adiciona a capacidade de marcar campos de cartão de crédito
- Corrige um bug onde campos ocultáveis não escondiam corretamente ao salvar entradas de cartão de crédito
- Corrige vários problemas na experiência do iPad com o Strongbox
- Corrige uma falha ao adicionar ou abrir um banco de dados Dropbox se a conta tiver muitos arquivos
- Corrige um problema que impedia alguns usuários de conectar aos seus bancos de dados WebDAV
- Atualiza campos de texto na entrada WebDAV para remover toda autocorreção
- Remove hífens dos números de cartão de crédito ao preencher automaticamente
- Corrige uma falha no iOS 18 e anteriores

Se você está gostando da nova versão do Strongbox, seria ótimo se pudesse deixar uma avaliação positiva na App Store. Faz uma grande diferença para nós, desenvolvedores Indie. Obrigado!

Se estiver encontrando problemas ou não estiver satisfeito, nos avise (support@strongboxsafe.com) e resolveremos.

- Equipe Strongbox
pt.description:
O Strongbox é uma aplicação para manter todas suas senhas armazenadas com segurança e protegidas por uma senha mestra. São suportados of formatos abertos PasswordSafe e KeePass.

*** Funcionalidades ***
- Desbloqueio com Face ID/Touch ID para garantir a maior conveniência, segurança e velocidade de acesso possiveis.

- Desbloqueio com Código PIN com opção de PIN sob Coerção para lidar com situações difíceis.

- Proteção YubiKey - proteja suas bases de dados com um token físico.

- Seguro - protegido por criptografia de nível militar.

- Privativo - Um visualizador de anexos embutido no aplicativo protege seus documentos, fotos e vídeos.

- Audite suas senhas - Automaticamente consulte se sua base de dados contém senhas fracas, incluindo consultas com o 'Have I Been Pwned'.

- Suporte a Nuvem, para que você consiga acessar seus cofres armazenados no iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV ou SFTP mesmo quando estiver offline. Use o app Arquivos para ter muito mais opções de armazenamento ou guarde seu cofre de maneira segura apenas no seu dispositivo. Você escolhe onde guardar seu cofre.

- Consulte todas as suas senhas e segredos instantaneamente usando uma busca poderosa e profunda. Autocomplete novos registros e gere automaticamente senhas seguras.

- Compatível - Importe/Exporte usando o app Arquivos, Email, CSV, Compartilhamento de Arquivos do iTunes ou armazenamento na nuvem.

- Padrões da Indústria - São usados os formatos já testados pelo tempo Password Safe e KeePass, então você pode importar qualquer cofre de senhas que tiver.

- Abundância de Funcionalidades
	- Geração de senhas incrivelmente configurável incluindo Diceware (XKCD) e senhas normais.
	- Auto limpeza da área de transferência após tempo definido.
	- Histórico de registro.
	- Referências de Campos do KeePass, Etiquetas, Ícones Personalizados, FavIcons (incluindo busca e download automáticos).
	- Suporte a geração de códigos de Autenticação em Duas Etapas (TOTP) - QR Codes, Steam e Manuais.
	
	*** O Strongbox é Freemium ***
Isso significa que o Strongbox é gratuito com um conjunto básico de funcionalidades, mas se você quiser existem funcionalidades melhoradas na versão Pro. Você pode se inscrever em um Período de Testes Gratuito por 90 dias para testar todas as funcionalidades Pro que quiser, sem obrigações, mas a maioria das pessoas considera a versão gratuita perfeitamente adequada.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
• O Strongbox provê Compras no Aplicativo (tanto para assinaturas auto renováveis quanto para o pagamento único) das versões Pro do App.
• Uma opção de pagamento adiantado (que não é feita dentro do App) também existe, consulte o site do Strongbox para mais detalhes.
• Assinaturas são auto renováveis com pagamentos recorrentes. Cancele a qualquer momento.
• Os períodos de tempo das assinaturas são mensal, trimestral ou anual, à escolha do usuário.
• O usuário também pode escolher comprar, com um pagamento único, uma versão Pro vitalícia do App.
• O pagamento será cobrado da sua Conta iTunes na confirmação da compra.
• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a auto renovação seja desativada com pelo menos 24 horas de antecedência do fim do período atual.
• A Conta iTunes será cobrada pela renovação dentro das 24 horas antecedentes ao fim do período atual, e identificará o custo da renovação.
• Assinaturas podem ser gerenciadas e a auto renovação pode ser desligada na página de Configuração da Conta após a compra.
• Qualquer porção não utilizada do período de testes, se oferecido, será revogada quando o usuário comprar uma assinatura onde aplicável.
• A Política de Privacidade pode ser encontrada aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy
• Os Termos de Uso podem ser encontrados aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms

pt.description:
RCS: Real Combat Simulator – Domine os Céus!
A Experiência de Combate Aéreo Militar Definitiva para Celular

Assuma o controle no simulador de voo militar mais avançado: pilote caças lendários, participe de combates aéreos épicos, domine o combate ar-ar e ar-terra e prove sua habilidade como piloto de combate de elite.

Voe e Lute em Qualquer Lugar do Mundo!!

- Domine decolagens, pousos e missões de combate completas
- Pilote jatos de última geração com aviônicos realistas e cabines detalhadas
- Acesse milhares de aeroportos e bases aéreas militares do mundo todo
- Treine com tutoriais interativos e aprimore suas habilidades de combate

Caças Realistas:
Voe com aeronaves fielmente recriadas com cabines dinâmicas, física de voo autêntica e sistemas de armas completos
- A-10C Thunderbolt II – A potência blindada de apoio aéreo aproximado, com o canhão GAU-8 Avenger e capacidade de ataque de precisão.
- F/A-18 Super Hornet – Um jato multifuncional versátil para porta-aviões com aviônicos avançados e amplo armamento, perfeito para combates aéreos e ataques de precisão.
- M-346FA Master – Um caça-treinador moderno e ágil, equipado com telas digitais e sensores avançados.
- F-16C Fighting Falcon – Emblemático caça multifuncional, valorizado por sua velocidade, agilidade e versatilidade. Equipado com radar avançado, controles de voo por sinais elétricos e uma gama de armas de precisão ar-ar e ar-terra.
Mais aeronaves em breve!

Recursos de Combate Imersivos:
- Zonas de batalha globais com clima e efeitos de hora do dia reais
- Radar avançado e sistemas de mira para ameaças aéreas e terrestres
- Arsenal completo de mísseis, bombas, canhões e contramedidas
- Manobras de alta velocidade e terreno baseado em satélite

Editor de Missão e Multijogador:
- Crie missões personalizadas: marque objetivos, controle o clima e defina a IA inimiga
- Construa suas próprias salas, crie cenários e voe em missões em conjunto no modo multijogador em tempo real
- Escolha seu Campo de Batalha: selecione entre locais realistas do mundo e bases aéreas militares
- Compartilhe suas criações e reviva suas melhores batalhas com ferramentas avançadas de replay

Personalize sua experiência:
- Personalize seu jato com pinturas e padrões de camuflagem autênticos
- Capture combates aéreos cinematográficos com câmeras avançadas no jogo
- Compartilhe seus destaques de combate com a comunidade RCS

Conexão com a internet é necessária para a simulação completa e os recursos multijogador. Alguns recursos podem exigir uma assinatura.

Baixe agora o simulador de voo militar definitivo! Pilote caças modernos, participe de intensas missões de combate aéreo e domine os céus no RCS: Real Combat Simulator.

TERMOS DE USO: https://www.rortos.com/terms-of-use/
Suporte: rcs@rortos.com

pt.description:
The ultimate system monitor, seamlessly integrated into your menubar.

iStat Menus covers a huge range of stats, including CPU, GPU, memory, network usage, disk usage, time, battery, weather and more. iStat Menus 7 is a full reboot, sporting an all-new design with hundreds of big and small improvements. iStat Menus is unmatched in efficiency, and is the most CPU-friendly system monitoring app.

• CPU and GPU •

Highly detailed CPU info, with current usage for individual cores, history graphs, load averages, uptime, CPU frequency, and a list of the apps using the most CPU. Efficiency and performance cores can be styled differently. Plus, GPU processor, memory, temperature, and frequency on supported Macs.

• Weather • Requires a paid weather subscription •

Quickly glance at current conditions in your menu bar, or dive into an incredibly detailed hourly forecast and weekly weather overview, covering low and high temperature, wind speed and direction, chance of rain, humidity, dew point, UV index, pressure, visibility and more.

• Memory •

Extensive memory stats covering usage, history, memory pressure, compressed memory, swap, and a list of the apps using the most memory.

• Rules •

iStat Menus can notify you of an incredibly wide range of events, based on CPU, GPU, memory, disks, network, sensors, battery, power and weather. This lets you be notified when your public IP has changed, if your internet connection is down, if CPU usage is above 60% for more than 10 seconds, if disk space is low, or a near-infinite range of other options.

• Disk usage and activity •

See used space, free space, and disk activity in your menu bar. S.M.A.R.T. status monitoring, per app disk usage, and more detail for all your disks is only a click away.

• Network •

Keep on top of what’s being sent and received for all network connections with history graphs, current bandwidth usage, and a bandwidth breakdown for the top apps, as well as detailed connection info, bandwidth graphs, public and private IP addresses, and an internet connectivity indicator.

• Battery and power •

Detailed info on your battery’s current state and a highly configurable menu item that can change if you’re draining, charging, or completely charged. Plus, battery levels for Bluetooth devices.

• Sensors •

A realtime listing of the sensors in your Mac, including temperatures, hard drive temperatures (where supported), fans, CPU frequency, GPU frequency (where supported), voltages, current and power. Fan speeds can be controlled, and even switched or gradually ramped based on temperatures and battery state.

• Date and time •

Highly customisable menu bar clocks, a calendar with upcoming events, and world clocks with detailed sun and moon info. Each world clock can have a custom name, to make it easier to see the time for coworkers or family members.

• Combined •

Combined mode combines multiple iStat Menus items into a single menu bar item. You can choose what’s shown in the menu bar and what’s shown in the menu, allowing you to save space in the menu bar while still having access to all the information. It’s super handy on laptops.

Privacy policy:
https://bjango.com/privacy/

Terms of use:
https://bjango.com/help/istatmenus7/licenseagreement/

pt.description:
Whisper Notes - Transcrição Offline

Grave voz ou importe ficheiros áudio/vídeo para obter transcrições precisas—100% offline, no seu dispositivo.
Sem limites de gravação, sem subscrições, sem carregamentos na nuvem. Apenas $4.99, uma vez.

■ Funcionalidades principais
- Transcrição 100% offline—o seu áudio nunca sai do seu dispositivo
- Grave notas de voz, reuniões, palestras—duração ilimitada
- Importe ficheiros áudio/vídeo (MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV)—transcreva offline
- Extraia legendas de vídeos da sua Biblioteca—sem necessidade de carregar
- Mais de 100 idiomas suportados, deteção automática
- Exporte com marcações de tempo (SRT, VTT, TXT)
- Processe múltiplos ficheiros em lote

■ Privacidade e velocidade
As suas gravações ficam no seu iPhone/Mac, sempre. Sem necessidade de internet, sem carregamentos na nuvem, nunca.

Velocidade de transcrição: No iPhone 15, 5 minutos de áudio demoram cerca de 1 minuto. Dispositivos mais antigos são mais lentos, mas funcionam bem.

■ Preço
$4.99 pagamento único. Aplicações similares cobram mais de $100/ano em subscrições.
Sem taxas recorrentes, sem compras na aplicação, sem anúncios. Pague uma vez, use para sempre.
Não está satisfeito? Toque em Definições → Solicitar reembolso.

■ Perguntas frequentes

Funciona completamente offline?
Sim. O seu áudio nunca sai do seu dispositivo. Funciona em aviões, áreas remotas, em qualquer lugar.

Há limite de tempo para gravações?
Sem limite. Grave durante horas se quiser. Gravações mais longas apenas demoram mais tempo a transcrever no seu dispositivo.

Suporta transcrição em tempo real durante a gravação?
Não durante a gravação, mas sim durante a transcrição—depois de terminar de gravar, verá a transcrição aparecer em tempo real conforme é gerada.

Onde os meus dados são armazenados?
Apenas no seu dispositivo. Não temos acesso. Nota: Se eliminar a aplicação, as suas gravações também são eliminadas (porque não guardamos cópias de segurança secretas). Exporte ficheiros importantes regularmente.

Porquê sem resumos de IA?
Privacidade. Nunca carregamos as suas gravações para nenhum serviço de IA. Quer resumos? Copie a transcrição e use a sua ferramenta de IA preferida. Não prendemos os seus dados num sistema de IA proprietário.

Porque é que a transcrição para quando mudo de aplicação?
O iOS limita o uso de GPU em segundo plano para aplicações de terceiros. Simplesmente volte à aplicação e toque em "Retranscrever"—ela reiniciará.

Posso importar ficheiros áudio/vídeo existentes?
Sim. Importe ficheiros MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV e transcreva-os offline. Ótimo para extrair legendas de vídeos sem carregar para serviços na nuvem.

Que idiomas são suportados?
Mais de 100 idiomas incluindo: English, Deutsch, Español, Русский, 한국어, Français, 日本語, Português, Türkçe, Polski, Català, Nederlands, Arabic, Svenska, Italiano, Bahasa Indonesia, Hindi, Suomi, Tiếng Việt, Hebrew, Українська, Greek, Bahasa Melayu, Čeština, Română, Dansk, Magyar, Tamil, Norsk, Thai, Urdu, Hrvatski, Bulgarian, Lietuvių, Latina, Māori, Malayalam, Cymraeg, Slovenčina, Telugu, Persian, Latviešu, Bengali, Српски, Azərbaycan, Slovenščina, Kannada, Eesti, Macedonian, Brezhoneg, Euskara, Íslenska, Armenian, Nepali, Mongolian, Bosanski, Kazakh, Shqip, Kiswahili, Galego, Marathi, Punjabi, Sinhala, Khmer, chiShona, Yorùbá, Soomaali, Afrikaans, Occitan, Georgian, Belarusian, Tajik, Sindhi, Gujarati, Amharic, Yiddish, Lao, Uzbek, Føroyskt, Kreyòl Ayisyen, Pashto, Turkmen, Nynorsk, Malti, Sanskrit, Luxembourgish, Myanmar, Tibetan, Tagalog, Malagasy, Assamese, Tatar, Hawaiian, Lingala, Hausa, Bashkir, Javanese, Sundanese, 简体中文, 繁體中文

■ Contacto
Questões? Envie um email para support@whispernotes.app
Saiba mais: whispernotes.app

pt.releaseNotes:
• Improved the layout of text in expanded to-dos.
• Improved the fade effect when list contents were obscured by system UI elements.
• Adjusted the navigation bar button styles of many dialogs on iOS 26.
• Fixed a bug where some buttons didn’t have the correct border appearance.
• Fixed a bug where scroll indicators would be cut-off by the rounded corners of the window/device.
• Fixed a bug where the expanded to-do toolbar would disappear while presenting the Delete confirmation.
• Fixed a bug where sharing from Apple Maps into Things didn’t work correctly.
• Fixed a bug where, if editing text, Cmd+LeftArrow would navigate back rather than move the cursor to the beginning of the line.
• Fixed a crash that would occur when copying and pasting a to-do from a repeating project into another list (e.g. Today).
• Improved the Todoist importer (now requires iOS 17.4 or later).


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for iOS and watchOS 26, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, more styles for the icon and widgets, and a control button on Apple Watch.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos; and glassy buttons that reflect and refract their surroundings.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within iOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: In addition to the Dark and Tinted styles, iOS 26 introduces Clear – a glass-like style that lets your wallpaper shine through. To change your style on iPhone, long-press your Home Screen, then tap Edit > Customize.


CONTROL BUTTON ON APPLE WATCH

Things’ handy New To-Do control is now available on Apple Watch. Press the side button to reveal Control Center and tap Edit. The control button lets you quickly create a new to-do, via swipe, type, or talk.


We hope you enjoy using Things on iOS 26 and watchOS 26!
pt.description:
Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals.

Best of all, it’s easy to use. Within the hour, you’ll have everything off your mind and neatly organized—from routine tasks to your biggest life goals—and you can start focusing on what matters today.

“Things offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.”
—Wirecutter, The New York Times


KEY FEATURES

• Your To-Dos
Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do—each a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps.

• Your Projects
Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There’s also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule.

• Your Areas
Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion.

• Your Plan
Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :)


MORE THINGS TO LOVE

As you dive deeper, you’ll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few:

• Reminders — set a time and Things will remind you.
• Repeaters — automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set.
• This Evening — a special place for your evening plans.
• Calendar integration — see your events and to-dos together.
• Tags — categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists.
• Quick Find — instantly find to-dos or switch between lists.
• Magic Plus — drag the + button to insert to-dos anywhere in a list.
• Share extension — create to-dos with content from other apps.
• Widgets — see lists on your home/lock screens.
• Mail to Things — forward an email to Things; now it’s a to-do.
• Markdown — structure & style your notes.
• And much more!


MADE FOR IPHONE

Things is tailored to the iPhone with deep system integrations as well. A great example is the Share extension, which allows you to create to-dos with content from other apps, such as a link to a website you want to get back to.

You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, add a variety of widgets, create to-dos via Siri, import from Reminders—Things can do it all! There’s even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows.


MADE FOR APPLE WATCH

Things comes with a great app for Apple Watch. Just raise your wrist to glance at your Today list, mark to-dos complete as you go, and dictate new ones on the fly—all synced instantly with your iPhone, iPad, and Mac.


AWARD-WINNING DESIGN

Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection.

“It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.”
—Apple


GET THINGS TODAY

Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do!

• Things is also available for Mac, iPad, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately).
• Sync is provided for free via our Things Cloud service.
• A free trial is available for Mac: www.things.app

If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

pt.releaseNotes:
- New: You can now read and clear the error memory of the engine control unit through CarPlay.
- Fixed: Connection issue with unresponsive control units.
pt.description:
BimmerLink is the direct link to your BMW or MINI. Using one of the supported OBD adapters, you can read trouble codes or display sensor values in realtime, check the current state of the DPF in your car or register a new battery after replacement. BimmerLink even allows you to remotely control the exhaust flap or mute the Active Sound Design in your car.

READ AND CLEAR TROUBLE CODES
Diagnose your car as would otherwise be possible only by your Service Partner. In contrast to generic OBD apps that read emission related errors only, BimmerLink allows you to read and clear trouble codes from ALL control units in your car.

DISPLAY REALTIME SENSOR VALUES
BimmerLink provides a big selection of values like oil temperature or boost pressure. Keep an eye on all the important parameters of your car with a personalized dashboard.

EXHAUST FLAP REMOTE CONTROL*
Take control over the exhaust flap in your car and decide yourself, whether it should be closed or open.

ACTIVE SOUND DESIGN**
If you do not like the artificial engine sound generated in your car, just mute the Active Sound Design with BimmerLink.

SOUND TUNING***
The “Sound Tuning” option allows you to disable the “exhaust burble“ in cars equipped with the S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4).

DPF REGENERATION****
BimmerLink allows you to check the current state of the diesel particulate filter in your car. Find out when the last regeneration took place or how much ash has accumulated in the filter and start a regeneration with the touch of a button.

CARPLAY ADD-ON*****
Enhance your driving experience with the CarPlay add-on for BimmerLink. Access your sensor values on your car's display for improved vehicle monitoring, all integrated seamlessly with CarPlay for ease of use.

BATTERY REGISTRATION
If you want to replace the battery in your car, this has to be registered in the engine control unit and BimmerLink allows you to do this yourself now.

PARKING BRAKE SERVICE MODE
BimmerLink allows you to activate the service mode for the electromechanical parking brake.

SERVICE RESET
Reset the service display in your car after carrying out maintenance work like a brake pad replacement or an engine oil change.

RESET SHORT CIRCUIT LOCKS
Unlock lamp outputs that were disabled due to a short circuit.

TRANSMISSION ADAPTATION VALUES
Check the adaptation values of the ZF 8HP automatic transmission in your vehicle.

REQUIRED ACCESSORIES
To use the app, one of the supported Bluetooth or WiFi OBD adapters or cables is required. For more information please visit https://bimmerlink.app.

SUPPORTED CARS
- 1 Series (2004+)
- 2 Series, M2 (2013+)
- 2 Series Active Tourer (2014+)
- 2 Series Gran Tourer (2015+)
- 3 Series, M3 (2005+)
- 4 Series, M4 (2013+)
- 5 Series, M5 (2003+)
- 6 Series, M6 (2003+)
- 7 Series (2008+)
- 8 Series (2018+)
- X1 (2009+)
- X2 (2018+)
- X3, X3 M (2010+)
- X4, X4 M (2014+)
- X5, X5 M (2006+)
- X6, X6 M (2008+)
- X7 (2019+)
- Z4 (2009+)
- i3 (2013+)
- i4 (2021+)
- i7 (2022+)
- i8 (2013+)
- iX (2021+)
- iX1 (2022+)
- iX3 (2021+)
- MINI (2006+)
- Toyota Supra (2019+)

* Only for cars that are equipped with an exhaust flap by factory.
** Only for cars that are equipped with the “Active Sound Design“ by factory.
*** Only for cars with S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4).
**** Only for cars with a diesel engine.
***** Additional in-app purchase required.

pt.description:
Dive into the world of the energy industry with the Power Grid app, designed by award-winning author Friedemann Friese.

Global Domination: Conquer energy markets worldwide on maps such as USA, Germany, France, Benelux, Eastern Europe, South Africa, Italy and the Middle East. Each map brings unique gameplay that will put your strategic skills to the test.

Tutorial & Help: Whether you're an experienced Power Grid player or a beginner, the game features a detailed tutorial that walks you through the basics step-by-step. And if you have any questions while playing, context-sensitive help is available to make sure you're always on the right track.

Achievements:  Challenge yourself by unlocking a variety of achievements. These achievements range from strategic feats to special challenges.

Recharged Version: The app includes the Recharged version with Against the Trust and MAGA variants that make the gameplay even more diverse and challenging.

Exciting Gameplay: Challenge AI opponents or play against friends in real-time or turn-based.

Online Domination: The Power Grid app allows you to compete against friends or rivals from around the world. The app gives you the opportunity to compete with players from all over the world.

Choose your path: a variety of maps and map variants are available to customize and refine your strategy. Adapt to the specifics of each and outsmart your opponents to get to the top of the power industry.

The Power Grid app has been carefully designed to seamlessly bring the charm of the board game to your smartphone or tablet. The intuitive interface ensures a smooth gaming experience for both experienced players and novices.

Don't miss out on the electrifying fun and challenges offered by the Power Grid app! Download the app now and embark on a journey to conquer the power market one move at a time. Whether you're playing alone and looking for a challenge or you're a player looking to engage in epic duels with friends, the Power Grid app offers all that and more.

pt.description:
"The End of Han Dynasty" requer que a versão do sistema seja iOS 16 e superior e use iPhone 7 ou 7Plus, iPhone 8 ou 8 Plus, iPhone X e superior, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 ou qualquer iPad Pro para jogar.


Introdução do jogo

"Três Reinos: Hegemonia no Fim da Dinastia Han" é um jogo SLG baseado em turnos cuidadosamente produzido pelo Longyou Tianxia Studio. É baseado principalmente no novo pensamento das pessoas e na nova perspectiva do jogo Três Reinos para criar um mundo diferente dos Três Reinos. Com base no retorno à categoria de estratégia tradicional, ele retrata profundamente as diferenças regionais entre as cidades dos três países e as semelhanças e diferenças das próprias capacidades e características de cada comandante militar. Em termos de combate, destaca o encanto de combinar a hora certa, o lugar certo e a implantação de pessoas.

Funcionalidades do jogo

Um: estilo clássico de bordado com desenho de linha branca, simples e elegante

As cabeças dos personagens adotam o estilo e a cor do bordado em linha branca da clássica história em quadrinhos "Romance dos Três Reinos". A interface do jogo adota o estilo antigo e o design com charme antigo, autêntico estilo chinês.


Dois: modo de gestão governamental simples e fácil de usar:

Arranjos básicos de assuntos internos, exploração de pessoal, reconhecimento militar e desenvolvimento de tecnologia adotam um modo de gerenciamento de posicionamento para reduzir operações tediosas e repetitivas e permitir que os jogadores se concentrem em outros eventos. No modo de jogo monarca, os jogadores só precisam prestar atenção à gestão da capital e do país. Outras cidades são entregues ao prefeito. Use a política para dar diferentes instruções militares e políticas para a subcidade.


Três: configurações de conteúdo de jogo extremamente ricas:

De 184 a 280 DC, mais de 1.300 generais (incluindo generais históricos e históricos) apareceram em cena.

As capacidades básicas de 30 generais são divididas e as capacidades dos generais são diferenciadas em detalhes.

Mais de 300 configurações independentes das características dos generais, totalmente destacar as diferenças individuais dos generais.

Existem mais de 500 itens e cenários de tesouro com evidências de pesquisa. Uma variedade de classificações é dividida para atender a diferentes preferências.

Quase mais de 60 tipos diferentes de cidades, mais de 200 características urbanas bem documentadas e produtos especiais.

Ricos itens de desenvolvimento técnico e suporte em todo o sistema de jogo. Reflete a importância da força científica e tecnológica.

As seis armas básicas e mais de uma dúzia de armas especiais constituem um rico sistema de armas.

Sistema super rico de cargos oficiais e títulos nobres.

O sistema de casamento apontado pelo monarca e o sistema de treinamento e herança infantil humanizado.

Vários fenômenos naturais e desastres de eventos simulam o período conturbado dos Três Reinos.

Muitas forças estrangeiras e bandidos e bandidos precisam de você para esmagá-los e eliminá-los.

Uma riqueza de visitas, mercadores, imortais, celebridades, médicos, mestres artesãos, espadachins vagam por aí, desencadeando vários eventos funcionais.


Quatro: Retorne ao sistema clássico de combate baseado em turnos, com foco na formação estratégica de tropas

A introdução do clima, topografia e alturas dos blocos destaca com mais destaque a influência dos fatores de tempo e localização na guerra.
Send feedback
History
Saved
Community

pt.releaseNotes:
Esta atualização do Strongbox suporta importação de mais gerenciadores de senhas e corrige alguns problemas com bancos de dados hospedados no WebDAV e Dropbox.

- Strongbox agora suporta importação do Minimalist & ProtonPass
- Adiciona a capacidade de marcar campos de cartão de crédito
- Corrige um bug onde campos ocultáveis não escondiam corretamente ao salvar entradas de cartão de crédito
- Corrige vários problemas na experiência do iPad com o Strongbox
- Corrige uma falha ao adicionar ou abrir um banco de dados Dropbox se a conta tiver muitos arquivos
- Corrige um problema que impedia alguns usuários de conectar aos seus bancos de dados WebDAV
- Atualiza campos de texto na entrada WebDAV para remover toda autocorreção
- Remove hífens dos números de cartão de crédito ao preencher automaticamente
- Corrige uma falha no iOS 18 e anteriores

Se você está gostando da nova versão do Strongbox, seria ótimo se pudesse deixar uma avaliação positiva na App Store. Faz uma grande diferença para nós, desenvolvedores Indie. Obrigado!

Se estiver encontrando problemas ou não estiver satisfeito, nos avise (support@strongboxsafe.com) e resolveremos.

- Equipe Strongbox
pt.description:
O Strongbox é uma aplicação para manter todas suas senhas armazenadas com segurança e protegidas por uma senha mestra. São suportados of formatos abertos PasswordSafe e KeePass.

*** Funcionalidades ***
- Desbloqueio com Face ID/Touch ID para garantir a maior conveniência, segurança e velocidade de acesso possiveis.

- Desbloqueio com Código PIN com opção de PIN sob Coerção para lidar com situações difíceis.

- Proteção YubiKey - proteja suas bases de dados com um token físico.

- Seguro - protegido por criptografia de nível militar.

- Privativo - Um visualizador de anexos embutido no aplicativo protege seus documentos, fotos e vídeos.

- Audite suas senhas - Automaticamente consulte se sua base de dados contém senhas fracas, incluindo consultas com o 'Have I Been Pwned'.

- Suporte a Nuvem, para que você consiga acessar seus cofres armazenados no iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV ou SFTP mesmo quando estiver offline. Use o app Arquivos para ter muito mais opções de armazenamento ou guarde seu cofre de maneira segura apenas no seu dispositivo. Você escolhe onde guardar seu cofre.

- Consulte todas as suas senhas e segredos instantaneamente usando uma busca poderosa e profunda. Autocomplete novos registros e gere automaticamente senhas seguras.

- Compatível - Importe/Exporte usando o app Arquivos, Email, CSV, Compartilhamento de Arquivos do iTunes ou armazenamento na nuvem.

- Padrões da Indústria - São usados os formatos já testados pelo tempo Password Safe e KeePass, então você pode importar qualquer cofre de senhas que tiver.

- Abundância de Funcionalidades
	- Geração de senhas incrivelmente configurável incluindo Diceware (XKCD) e senhas normais.
	- Auto limpeza da área de transferência após tempo definido.
	- Histórico de registro.
	- Referências de Campos do KeePass, Etiquetas, Ícones Personalizados, FavIcons (incluindo busca e download automáticos).
	- Suporte a geração de códigos de Autenticação em Duas Etapas (TOTP) - QR Codes, Steam e Manuais.
	
	*** O Strongbox é Freemium ***
Isso significa que o Strongbox é gratuito com um conjunto básico de funcionalidades, mas se você quiser existem funcionalidades melhoradas na versão Pro. Você pode se inscrever em um Período de Testes Gratuito por 90 dias para testar todas as funcionalidades Pro que quiser, sem obrigações, mas a maioria das pessoas considera a versão gratuita perfeitamente adequada.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
• O Strongbox provê Compras no Aplicativo (tanto para assinaturas auto renováveis quanto para o pagamento único) das versões Pro do App.
• Uma opção de pagamento adiantado (que não é feita dentro do App) também existe, consulte o site do Strongbox para mais detalhes.
• Assinaturas são auto renováveis com pagamentos recorrentes. Cancele a qualquer momento.
• Os períodos de tempo das assinaturas são mensal, trimestral ou anual, à escolha do usuário.
• O usuário também pode escolher comprar, com um pagamento único, uma versão Pro vitalícia do App.
• O pagamento será cobrado da sua Conta iTunes na confirmação da compra.
• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a auto renovação seja desativada com pelo menos 24 horas de antecedência do fim do período atual.
• A Conta iTunes será cobrada pela renovação dentro das 24 horas antecedentes ao fim do período atual, e identificará o custo da renovação.
• Assinaturas podem ser gerenciadas e a auto renovação pode ser desligada na página de Configuração da Conta após a compra.
• Qualquer porção não utilizada do período de testes, se oferecido, será revogada quando o usuário comprar uma assinatura onde aplicável.
• A Política de Privacidade pode ser encontrada aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy
• Os Termos de Uso podem ser encontrados aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms

pt.sellerName: Hangzhou Beesoft Information Technology Co., Ltd.
pt.releaseNotes: This is a tiny update that we've improved the app stability to help us serve you better.
pt.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

pt.releaseNotes:
• Added Quick Entry Autofill support for the ChatGPT Atlas browser.
• Added a workaround for a macOS 26.1 bug where Apple Mail provided malformed links via Quick Entry Autofill.


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for macOS 26 Tahoe, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, control buttons, support for new widget styles, and more.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice a touch of glass in the sidebar that lets a hint of color shine through; increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within macOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: Things’ app icon and widgets now support styles on Mac. To change your style, go to System Settings > Appearance and choose from Dark, Tinted, or Clear.


QUICK CONTROLS

Things’ handy control buttons are now available on Mac. Open Control Center from the menu bar and click Edit Controls. Things offers controls for New To-Do and List (you choose a list). You can place them in Control Center, or directly in your menu bar for one-click access.


AND MORE

• Spotlight can now create to-dos. After you’ve invoked Spotlight (⌘ Space), type “Create To-Do”, press Return, then enter your title. Your new to-do is created in the Inbox – even if Things isn’t running.
• Things’ Quick Entry feature now supports adding links from the new Comet browser.


We hope you enjoy using Things on macOS 26 Tahoe!
pt.description:
Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals.

Best of all, it’s easy to use. Within the hour, you’ll have everything off your mind and neatly organized—from routine tasks to your biggest life goals—and you can start focusing on what matters today.

“Things offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.”
—Wirecutter, The New York Times


KEY FEATURES

• Your To-Dos
Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do—each a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps.

• Your Projects
Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There’s also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule.

• Your Areas
Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion.

• Your Plan
Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :)


MORE THINGS TO LOVE

As you dive deeper, you’ll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few:

• Reminders — set a time and Things will remind you.
• Repeaters — automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set.
• This Evening — a special place for your evening plans.
• Calendar integration — see your events and to-dos together.
• Tags — categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists.
• Quick Entry — create to-dos from anywhere, as soon as the thought hits you.
• Quick Find — instantly locate to-dos, headings, or tags.
• Type Travel — jump from list to list with your keyboard; just start typing!
• Widgets — see your lists on the desktop or in Notification Center.
• Mail to Things — forward an email to Things; now it’s a to-do.
• Markdown — structure & style your notes.
• And much more!


MADE FOR MAC

Things is tailored to the Mac with deep system integrations as well. A great example is Quick Entry with Autofill: a shortcut that grabs content from other apps and adds it to Things for you, such as a link to a website or an email you want to get back to.

You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, open multiple windows, add a variety of widgets, import from Reminders—Things can do it all! There’s even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows.


STAY PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO

Things also has full-featured apps for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately). All your devices sync seamlessly via our free Things Cloud service. It’s great to have everything at your fingertips when you need it!


AWARD-WINNING DESIGN

Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection.

“It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.”
—Apple


GET THINGS TODAY

Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do!

Visit our website now and get a free 15-day trial for your Mac: www.things.app

If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

pt.releaseNotes:
• Improved the layout of text in expanded to-dos.
• Improved the fade effect when list contents were obscured by system UI elements.
• Adjusted the navigation bar button styles of many dialogs on iOS 26.
• Fixed a bug where some buttons didn’t have the correct border appearance.
• Fixed a bug where scroll indicators would be cut-off by the rounded corners of the window/device.
• Fixed a bug where the expanded to-do toolbar would disappear while presenting the Delete confirmation.
• Fixed a bug where sharing from Apple Maps into Things didn’t work correctly.
• Fixed a bug where, if editing text, Cmd+LeftArrow would navigate back rather than move the cursor to the beginning of the line.
• Fixed a crash that would occur when copying and pasting a to-do from a repeating project into another list (e.g. Today).
• Improved the Todoist importer (now requires iOS 17.4 or later).


THINGS 3.22

Things is ready for iOS and watchOS 26, with a new app icon, an entirely refreshed interface, more styles for the icon and widgets, and a control button on Apple Watch.


FRESH LOOK & FEEL

• Things’ interface has been completely refreshed in every corner. You’ll notice increased rounding of corners for windows, dialogs, and to-dos; and glassy buttons that reflect and refract their surroundings.
• Things’ icon has been refined and realigned to sit beautifully within iOS 26. It’s familiar at a glance – and unmistakably Things.
• Icon & widget styles: In addition to the Dark and Tinted styles, iOS 26 introduces Clear – a glass-like style that lets your wallpaper shine through. To change your style on iPhone, long-press your Home Screen, then tap Edit > Customize.


CONTROL BUTTON ON APPLE WATCH

Things’ handy New To-Do control is now available on Apple Watch. Press the side button to reveal Control Center and tap Edit. The control button lets you quickly create a new to-do, via swipe, type, or talk.


We hope you enjoy using Things on iOS 26 and watchOS 26!

—Apple


GET THINGS TODAY

Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do!

• Things is also available for Mac, iPad, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately).
• Sync is provided for free via our Things Cloud service.
• A free trial is available for Mac: www.things.app

If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button

pt.description:
Manter-se na tarefa parece ser um verdadeiro desafio para a nossa geração ligada às telas. O "Be Focused" permite realizar tarefas dividindo-as em intervalos discretos, separados por pequenas pausas. É uma maneira surpreendentemente eficaz de manter a motivação e o foco. Crie tarefas, configure pausas e monitore seu progresso ao longo do dia, semana ou período personalizado. Use o Be Focused no seu iPhone, iPad ou Mac — tudo permanece perfeitamente sincronizado.

Gerenciamento de Tarefas

•	Crie e gerencie tarefas
•	Adicione notas e datas de vencimento às tarefas
•	Organize tarefas com etiquetas e filtros
•	Cole listas de tarefas de outros aplicativos

Controle do Cronômetro

•	Inicie, pause ou pule intervalos
•	Início automático do próximo intervalo (opcional)
•	Planeje os intervalos necessários para concluir as tarefas e acompanhe a precisão
•	Gerencie intervalos concluídos

Personalização do Cronômetro

•	Defina durações para sessões de trabalho, pausas curtas e longas
•	Determine o número de intervalos antes de uma pausa longa
•	Defina uma meta diária de intervalos concluídos
•	Atribua diferentes configurações de cronômetro para tarefas individuais

Relatórios

•	Visualize relatórios detalhados para monitorar seu progresso
•	Exporte seus dados em formato CSV

Sons e Notificações

•	Som de tique-taque do cronômetro com frequência ajustável
•	Variedade de sons de alarme
•	Notificações interativas
•	Volume ajustável para alarmes e cronômetro

Integração

•	Sincronize entre todos os seus dispositivos (iPhone, iPad, Mac) *
•	Integração com o Focus Matrix para gerenciar tarefas usando o princípio urgente/importante **
•	Integração com o aplicativo Atalhos para automatizar fluxos de trabalho

Acesso Rápido

•	Widgets para a Tela Bloqueada e Tela de Início
•	Atividades ao Vivo para a Tela Bloqueada e Ilha Dinâmica
•	Controle para iniciar ou parar o cronômetro a partir da Tela Bloqueada, Central de Controle ou Botão de Ação

Automação

•	Integração com o aplicativo Atalhos (controle tarefas e cronômetros via aplicativo Atalhos)
•	Automatize a execução de Atalhos em eventos no aplicativo Be Focused

Compatibilidade de Dispositivos

•	Compatível com Apple Watch
•	Também disponível para Mac
•	Suporte aos modos Escuro e Claro

* A sincronização com o Mac requer o Be Focused Pro para macOS, vendido separadamente.
** A integração com o Focus Matrix requer a versão Pro do Focus Matrix, vendida separadamente.

An Invading Horde has been spotted to the west of the Kingdom. The King has selected a lucky random subject to defend the Realm. 
You take on the role of the unfortunate farmer tasked with this great undertaking.

Build defensive Towers to defeat the Invading Horde. 
Complete levels to earn Stars to upgrade your Weapons, Obstacles and Magic.
Earn Gems to unlock more Towers, Obstacles and Magic. 

Features
● Fast paced Tower Defense action
● Quirky story line
● Pause the action to plan your strategy
● Cast Magic spells to smite the Horde
● Drop Obstacles in the road to slow down the Horde
● Unlock powerful new Towers, Obstacles, Items and Magic

Updated to support new OS
Updated localization
Fixed sound issue in bubble, brick break and matchtris
pt.description:
MiniGames é uma coleção de jogos novos, retro e modernos. Podes jogar no teu Apple Watch, iPhone ou iPad sem anúncios!
É como teres a tua própria arcada de jogos pessoal em movimento.

Esta coleção de 24 jogos inclui:

■ PONG
Joga um dos primeiros jogos de vídeo criados. Este jogo simples tipo tênis é um verdadeiro clássico.

■ BRICK BREAK
Um divertido jogo retro de blocos que caem. Usa a coroa digital ou o teu dedo para mover os blocos. Toca para rodar e desliza para baixo para colocar o bloco. Empilha os blocos para limpar uma linha e marcar pontos.

■ INVADERS
Ação clássica de arcade. Dispara em todos os invasores espaciais antes que te atinjam. Acerta na nave-mãe para pontos extra.

■ 2048
Diverte-te com o viciante jogo 2048 no teu relógio ou telefone. Desliza as peças numéricas para as juntar. Junta as peças para alcançar 2048.

■ TUBE TWIST
Guia o teu corredor por um tubo infinito.

■ BUBBLE
Jogo clássico de quebra-cabeças de correspondência 3. Liga as bolhas pela cor para as limpar.

■ MISSILE
Quanto tempo consegues sobreviver a um mortal bombardeamento de mísseis teleguiados? Manobra o teu avião de combate para evitar os mísseis e fazê-los colidir entre si.

■ HOP
Salta de plataforma em plataforma para ganhar altura e pontos. Dispara nos inimigos alados pelo caminho.

■ Drift
Desfruta do drifting de alta octanagem por uma estrada traiçoeira.

■ Cong
É como Pong, mas em círculo.

■ Tower
Constrói a tua torre empilhando blocos coloridos uns sobre os outros. Coloca-os perfeitamente para pontos extra.

■ FLAP
Guia o pássaro por uma floresta sem fim batendo asas.

■ FROG ROAD
Ajuda os simpáticos sapos a evitar os carros e atravessar a estrada. Uma atualização 3D do clássico jogo Frogger.

■ BLOCK RUN
Com vontade de correr? Ajuda o rapaz voxel a evitar os coloridos obstáculos saltando, rolando e virando nas esquinas.

■ MATCHTRIS
Uma mistura de Tetris e Dr. Mario. Move os blocos que caem para combinar 4 ou mais cores e limpá-los. Configura os blocos para quedas e combinações para combos e pontos extra.

■ DRONE
Pilota o teu drone pelos corredores intermináveis de uma nave alienígena.

■ THRUST
Coloca as tuas botas de foguete e desliza por uma caverna escura. Thrust combina um clássico jogo de voo em caverna com elementos de Flappy Bird.

■ SUPER JUMP
Levámos a diversão do humilde jogo de plataforma e misturámo-la com um corredor infinito.

■ RETRO RACER
Inspirado em jogos de corrida pseudo-3D como Outrun e Pole Position, mas com gráficos modernos.

■ CONTRA PANG
Uma mistura da ação de tiro do Contra com a diversão de estourar bolhas do Pang.

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
Uma nova reviravolta no clássico Space Invaders. Com um design circular único e muitos power-ups.

■ MOON SNAKE
Pegámos na clássica cobra a comer frutas e colocámo-la na lua. Evita as bombas e a tua própria cauda para sobreviver.

■ DUAL BREAK
O que poderia ser melhor do que o clássico jogo de paleta Breakout? E se houvesse power-ups e uma paleta extra para controlar?

■ CIRCLE BREAK
É como Pong num círculo, mas com Breakout.

pt.releaseNotes:
A lot of people wanted to try the app - made app free with a trial
- fix bug where material lists weren't showing on the material details sheet. now shows if material is in expeditions or workbenches
- fix padding between recycles from and recycles to
- fix padding in search bar
- add cool onboarding
- fix notifications not working
- design improvements
pt.description:
All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Arc drop list, guides and quest-line guides.

NOT affiliated with Embark. Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord.
